story:
A Revolutionary New Platform For Video Games

Think of the platform like a carnival or arcade (like Chucky Cheese in the digital world). You play the games and earn tokens. Cash in those tokens for real prizes (you can even save up for bigger prizes). Created by seasoned entrepreneurs and top tier talent, you will love our games and our platform!! When successfully funded, we will be opening up our API to Indie game developers (the little guys) around the world!! Help us build a world class platform and get rewarded for your generous contributions.

How It Works 

Play games and win real prizes!! 

 So to sum it up the steps are... 
1. Download One Of Our Games 
2. Sign Into Your Reward Spree Account 
3. Earn Tokens For Kicking A$$ 
4. Cash in Tokens for ACTUAL Prizes Via Our Redemption Site!!

Video Explanation Of The Platform
Watching this quick video is the best way to learn how the platform works!!

What Sorta Prizes?
Gift cards to Free Airfare and everything in between!! Redemption is easy, just select the prize you want and either purchase the item with your tokens or bid on it in an auction like fashion!!

Where The Money Will Go?

We will be spending the bulk of the money raised: (1) developing our first game title, (2) on the API and (3) supporting Indie developers on their journey of implementing our platform. A small portion of the budget will go towards completion of the platform and PR to attract more sponsors (the wonderful people/companies that donate the prizes). The more money we raise, the more excitement our sponsors will feel (which should lead to bigger and better prizes). Initially Hipster Hustle will be released for Android and IOS devices. PC/MAC/Linux release will follow shortly thereafter.

Additional Games and API 
In 2014 the video game industry generated more than $22B in revenue making it one of the most profitable sectors in the entertainment industry!! Unfortunately, very few companies account for the majority of this revenue. For this reason, we are (budget permitting) planning on partnering with select Indie developers to integrate the Reward Spree API into their own video games (sometime in late 2016). The hope is that allowing Indie developers to offer real rewards for playing their titles will give amateur developers a fighting chance to compete in an industry that is dominated by a few large studios!! Our budget is pretty tight and this is more of a stretch goal, so tell your friends and lets set a Indiegogo fundraising record!!

Our Team

When it comes to disruptive business models that shake up the status quo... well lets just say this is not our first rodeo.. it is sorta our specialty!! Our co-founders C-Level executives that have together raised over $100M in capital for past ventures. We also have a top notch creative and engineering team that has completed work for companies such as Disney Pixar!! 

Our First Game "Hipster Hustle"

Rewards For Donating

Hipster Abe T-Shirt ($35) 
Abraham Lincoln, one of the most iconic symbols of freedom in the world. He was the 16th president of the United States, suspected zombie hunter, and we believe secretly a fan of video games!! Abe tells us what he thinks about Reward Spree's new video game platform on this exclusive new t-shirt!!

In the spirit of our Hipster Hustle game, we have created a hilarious T-Shirt that catalogs the evolution of a Hipster!!

Our Story

How It All Began

Reward Spree was born late one night when a young boy made a startling discovery that had somehow eluded his elders for years. After playing his favorite video game for weeks, saving his "tokens" and finally earning enough to buy a digital pizza, he sadly told his dad "I wish I could eat this pizza, but its not real". A light bulb went off inside his father's head and he realized that this may in fact be the greatest discovery since the invention of the wheel. Playing video games is hard work and we should be rewarded for that hard work with REAL prizes, not lame digital medals!! Soon thereafter work began on Reward Spree.

The QUICK business model

Instead of traditional (lame) rewards like digital medals and character upgrades, we are offering real world prizes for excelling at digital game play. Our games will be available for Apple and Android products as well as online. The player will accrue "tokens" during game play for reaching certain achievements, that will be stored in the cloud and linked to their RewardSpree account. The player can redeem the "tokens" that they earn for actual prizes, such as free food, IPODS, free airfare, etc. So to sum it up, play games and earn REAL prizes!!! Our prizes are donated by sponsors and monetization comes from subtle in-app advertising!!

Challenges

We have been working on this project for almost 2 years, therefore a lot of the ground work is already completed. The platform is solid and pending a seamless migration to a more appropriate server, we predict very few challenges. Most of our effort will be dedicated to the development of our first few game titles, the API and supporting Indie developers on their journey of implementing our platform.

Meet Zane, the quirky star of our very first title "Hipster Hustle". Follow Zane in this platformer adventure game as his every day trip to the vintage record store gets turned upside down. Collect non fat, sugar free, skinny lattes to "power up" and stay on track!! Encounters with interesting creatures along the way may require you to think outside the box. Sometimes the best way to win a fight is with your bare fists, other times only a spontaneous dance battle of epic proportions will do!! Plenty of easter eggs will be hidden throughout the game to make it interesting and add some humor!! You may laugh, you may cry, but you will definitely appreciate the cool prizes that excelling at this game will bring you!!!
Hipster Hustle Game Play
Original Concept Art!!!Rewards For DonatingHipster Abe T-Shirt ($35) Abraham Lincoln, one of the most iconic symbols of freedom in the world. He was the 16th president of the United States, suspected zombie hunter, and we believe secretly a fan of video games!! Abe tells us what he thinks about Reward Spree's new video game platform on this exclusive new t-shirt!!

Hipster Evolution T-Shirt ($35)In the spirit of our Hipster Hustle game, we have created a hilarious T-Shirt that catalogs the evolution of a Hipster!!
Hipster For President T-Shirt ($35)This exclusive tee portrays Zane (the star of Hipster Hustle) in his bid for the White House!! 
Our StoryHow It All BeganReward Spree was born late one night when a young boy made a startling discovery that had somehow eluded his elders for years. After playing his favorite video game for weeks, saving his "tokens" and finally earning enough to buy a digital pizza, he sadly told his dad "I wish I could eat this pizza, but its not real". A light bulb went off inside his father's head and he realized that this may in fact be the greatest discovery since the invention of the wheel. Playing video games is hard work and we should be rewarded for that hard work with REAL prizes, not lame digital medals!! Soon thereafter work began on Reward Spree.The QUICK business modelInstead of traditional (lame) rewards like digital medals and character upgrades, we are offering real world prizes for excelling at digital game play. Our games will be available for Apple and Android products as well as online. The player will accrue "tokens" during game play for reaching certain achievements, that will be stored in the cloud and linked to their RewardSpree account. The player can redeem the "tokens" that they earn for actual prizes, such as free food, IPODS, free airfare, etc. So to sum it up, play games and earn REAL prizes!!! Our prizes are donated by sponsors and monetization comes from subtle in-app advertising!!
Challenges

We have been working on this project for almost 2 years, therefore a lot of the ground work is already completed. The platform is solid and pending a seamless migration to a more appropriate server, we predict very few challenges. Most of our effort will be dedicated to the development of our first few game titles, the API and supporting Indie developers on their journey of implementing our platform.

story:
Thanks for stopping by! First let me tell you a bit about me and our organization!

OUR BACKGROUND

So what is Iron Sentinels?? We are an esports organization helping our teams and other competitive gamers achieve a higher level of success! Currently we have three teams in CSGO, LoL, and COD. We are always looking to expand with new teams so if you want to start one you can contact us. We started this organization about a month ago and currently have a Twitter, YouTube, Twitch, Paypal, and gmail account to our name! The end goal of course being to become a major player in the ever growing esports industry!

A little about me as the organization leader. I am not a player on any of the teams but I have been an avid gamer since I was very young. Currently I am 20 years old, and in college to obtain my bachelors degree. Which is why I was brought in to run the organization. My degree is in business management and Entrepreneurship so it fits perfectly with running this as a business. I am currently 2 years into the degree and am excited to apply my knowledge to the real world through Iron Sentinels.

WHAT THE MONEY IS FOR

So where is all this money going? Simply put it is going towards the acquisition of a trademark for our logo and name. This is so we can protect our brand now and in the future from any misuse of it by other gamers and groups. Plus in the case of merchandising and apparel we need to be secure in selling without worries of legal issues. The reason why the amount is so high at $1500 is because the path we are taking to acquire this trademark is through an attorney. While we could do it ourselves or use a website to attempt this the problem this creates is a very high chance of our request being rejected. If it does get rejected it will cost more money and time to file it again. So in order to prevent this we are going to hire a professional to handle it to give us the greatest chance of success. I have already been in contact with a trademark attorney, but obviously can not commit to anything until the funds are raised. We have some money that i have invested personally in the organization but it is not nearly enough. I am willing to cover the difference if we get close to our goal as well. Any funds raised above the goal will be used to support our teams with travel costs, gear, etc. So we would love contributions from you and happily will give you some awesome perks for it!

story:
Are you the best on Madden 16?  FIFA 16? NBA2K? Halo? 

Want to play against some of the biggest celebrities and pro-athletes to your friends and other gamers!?

Our platform let's you finally prove that you are the BEST amongst your friends and other gamers!  

Your friends talking s**t in how great they are - tell them YOU GOT NEXT! 

Xtreme Tilt is a mobile platform in where you can play H2H matches against each other in a seamless way that allowed you to set up matches without being on a computer and win the coolest stuff - TV’s, new games, game tickets and anything along those lines. 

This gave birth to Xtreme Tilt, LLC., a mobile platform allowing gamers to play against their opponents - family, friends or other gamers and being able to win prizes.  Better yet – Xtreme Tilt is the first on the e-sports market that will allow automatic winner verification and player analytics.

We are made for the everyday casual gamer to the hardcore professional.  All who have one thing in common - to be the best and prove they are the best and being able to win amazing prizes with no money exchange.

Xtreme Tilt

·Allow gamers to set up "one touch" H2H (Head2Head) matches and Tournaments of their favorite console based gaming titles on their mobile device.

·Automatic tournament or H2H winner verification

·Player Analytics and Stats directly from the console (Xbox One, PS4)

·Options to win gaming credits for prizes such as (TVs, sports tickets, concert tickets, video games, clothing, etc).

We researched the industry long and hard for over 9 months.  Read complaints about one other platform similar, we analyzed thousands of survey answers in what gamers REALLY WANTED when it came to incentive based play against their opponent - we took every complaint, suggestion and issue and fixed it - all to give you Xtreme Tilt.

The three of us come with some hefty experience to take Xtreme Tilt all the way! We are gaming fanatics and in real life we are marketing gurus, creative digital architects and tech masterminds.  We bring over 25+ years experience in the marketing and technology fields.

We currently already have a PHASE I BETA version complete.  The first initial platform will be for XBOX/XBOX ONE and a Playstation version will launch Q1 2016. 

 We are working on Phase II. Thus far we have funded this entire project amongst the three of us.

Scheduled launch is Q1 2016.

XTreme Tilt Match Play Profiles Page


XTreme Tilt H2H Scheduler Page

XTreme Tilt Login HomePage 

XTreme Tilt Sample Ranking Page

"The Grandfather" is an atmospheric story driven point & click puzzle/horror game, told through a combination of unique use of comic book pages and narration. The game  is a collaboration from the creators of "The Lady" (Michael Patrick Rogers) and "Fingerbones" (David Szymanski). Michael and David both thrive at creating games with intriguing atmosphere in a horror style environment, telling a story in their own unique ways. The hand drawn art is by the amazing comic book artist Stanislav Yakimov.

story:
Here we are a young and committed team, being also friends for years, having a common passion: hospitality. 

In Hungary due to the regulation changes, the obsolate education system and the profession losing face, a huge distinction started to grow between service and real hospitality.

We do know that this process can only be stopped with enough courage and creativity and we have a good plan.

After working years as bartenders, waiters or managers in this industry we can tell that people working in this field are strongly threatened by stress and burn-out. This profession requires skills just as situational awareness, empathy, patience, good expression, adaptation and many more. 

In the last years we have been busy developing a method good enough to train hospitality workers (and after all service industry workers) on all these skills at the same time and also to keep them engaged and motivated.

And what we have achieved is much more what we have dreamt of. The Hospitality project has started to spread among hospitality professionals and beginners, giving them knowledge, great experience and honor. 

Hospitality boardgame has become a professional learning tool that gives the gift of joyful education on product knowledge, customer service and sales techniques. While training a professional team of hospitality workers, it also focuses on the well-being and mental health of the people working in the team. 

In the world of Hospitality, Ruby 'Red' Raymond is the owner of the Red Ruby restaurant for 50 years. All he wants now is to step aside and rest in Hawaii knowing his restaurant in good hands but he doesn't have a heir. Now Max, Tiffany, Mary-Anne and Higgins - the staff of the Red Ruby - have to do their bests to get on to the restaurant in the end. During their shifts (games) they collect income, tip and regular guests and whoever has the most in the end can lead the restaurant after Ruby has retired. Of course they need each other's help and support for the final success.

They are facing guests, problems, offers and questions just like in real life and to make it even more lifelike we built in lucky cards as well.

The role-play and quiz based game makes the players feel their importance, empowers them, prevents them from burn-out and raises guest satisfaction at the same time. It takes out rivalism but deeply strengthens cooperation. Also the most efficient way for language learning in this field.

The quiz part of the game is developed for bartenders and mixologists so far and the situational tasks are for all hospitality workers. The tutorial part can be tailored on a specific restaurant or bar, but we would like to work out a basic knowledge base in specified topics like wine, coffee and food.

This innovative approach to professional and emotional development uses the strongest elements of education, games, teamwork and personal goals to establish the hospitality aspect. 

What really proves the efficiency of Hospitality and predicts its success are the feedbacks of the restaurant and bar managers who are already using this method, and the feedbacks of the people who have played with it or have learnt with us already. We have 100 people saying the game is better than other ordinary methods and that they have learnt a lot about guest handling, problem solving, recomendation, brands and hospitality. 

Just a few of our favourite comments on the question 'What was the most important lesson of today's game':

 - 'Never stay at home when Hospitality team is organizing an event!' :)

 - 'Teamwork is better than playing alone'

 - 'Learning is fun' 

 - 'Be open for everyone!'

We tested the game on non-professionals and professionals with great results, created the imaginary and visual world of Hospitality as well. We organized public games for industry workers and the community began to grow. We faced the need for us because there is a lack of caring in this industry.

Now the real work begins, when we would like to start the production, organize even more bigger and smaller events in the name of professional restaurant and bar staff developement including leadership training. We would like to build an education system on Hospitality game, and also keep on teaching English and other foreign languages with it and later not only in Hungary but in Europe and than worldwide showing the beauty of the colourful international hospitality. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal with this campaign is to raise enough money to finish the game developement, produce enough board games for a start and finance the base elements of the project, that can help us extending our limits.

If we reach this goal, we will spend it on our graphic designer, he has already made a lot for us in advance.

We will produce the Hospitality board games for the trainings, that are enough for starting open trainings, public games and foreign language trainings. 

We will produce pocket Hospitality games, marked flair openers, compasses, bar towels and wine openers for giveaways on the public games in order to bring more people and teach them.

We will buy a well operating laptop for our video and photo editor to provide his working tool. 

We will launch a Hospitality website for kowledge sharing and online quizes.

We will spend 1000 $ on producing the Hospitality text book in which we collected incalculable worthy knowledge for the first time in Hungarian.

This money is calculated so that we could use 4000 $ for the further developement of the game. This means research, tests, translation and specificating on wine, coffee, food and other topics covering every kind of hospitality workers. 

We will produce our name cards, stickers, roll-ups and flyers to propagate community learning.

If we reach our goal, we will be able to bring joy, laughter and professional education into the lives of thousands of people and meanwhile increase the standard of Hungarian hospitality and raise guest satisfaction and business efficiency at the same time!


Please share this campaign in order to reach even more people like you who care about professional person-centered learning, creative and innovative methods. Please help us establish professional Hungarian hospitality and show it to the world.

You can also use the Indiegogo sharing tools.

story:
I created the MafiaLife game 16 years ago. Way before Mafia Wars built thier copycat and made millions. I could never afford to fight them. They partnered with Facebook and took off into the sunset. I faught to keep the game relevant, keeping it thriving for years with thousands of supporters and chronic players. Until the Facebook games took over. The stand alone MafiaLife website platform could not survive the technology requirements to stay hot in the industry.

Had to fight again, and put ALL my life savings into a rebuild of the MafiaLife game, on the Facebook platform. I used my own money, and reinvested every penny, partnered with programmers and made it happen. The game stayed alive on Facebook, and starting growing fast again. Until, Facebook demanded time and time again to maintain upgrades and add code to stay on it's platform. These upgrades required thousands of dollars each time they decided to upgrade, or my game would error, and stop working on Facebook. 

It became clearer and clearer what really needed to happen. The MafiaLife needs to be an application on its own solution, downloadable in the app stores, so it can become what it deserves to be. The best online mafia role playing game. 

I just ran out of money. I cannot afford to take the entire game code and have developers turn it into an app. Once the game is up, it has always proved to be self sustaining and thriving, profiting game. It just never had room to grow to where it needed to be. Technical obsticals always blocked. Turning it into an application will give it stability, and remove those obsticles. But, I need help. 16 years into this. I cannot let my baby just die. 

The latest FB upgrade shut the latest version down, and without funding, it may have seen it's end. Crowd funding, and seeking help from 16 years worth of MafiaLife supporters who want this game to stay alive, and know it deserves to be a mobile app is all I can turn to right now, unless I hit the lotto. 

So, if you feel that need to support my 16 years of hard work, and can help me hit my goal, please donate. And if you feel you can help in other ways, please email me chris@mafialife.com and let's talk. Thanks so much.

story:
Sphereus Unleashed  

Sphereus Unleashed is an action game with elements of a puzzle and arcade game. 
In Sphereus Unleashed, you are an alien probe that got caught by a wormhole and pulled through space and time. The wormhole thrusts you directly towards a black hole, the oblivion of all matter. Luckily for you, the strange dimension near the black hole is filled with debris, other objects and mysterious dark matter. By devouring dark matter you've got a chance to break free from the deadly black hole.

The player controls an alien sphere with the goal to gain as much mass as possible. The player can consume the black hole itself once he has reached critical mass. At that point he becomes a dark star. The sphere is controlled by changing the direction of the gravitational pull, which controls the sphere's movement direction and speed.


My name is Michal Brabec and I am a game designer and programmer from Czech Republic. Making games was always my dream and this is the first game I have finished to the point that it is ready for release. I am the founder and creator of my own little game studio 1-bit Barbecue.
Help me publish my game for Android, iOS, Windows and other platforms by funding the required hardware and developer accounts necessary to publish the game. Your support not only helps me to publish this game, but it also allows me to make more games in the future and publish them as well.

My studio has the motto: "You either do what you love or you don't." Your contributions will help me do what I love.

Mission of 1-bit Barbecue

"You either do what you love or you don't."
"Turning dreams into reality, one bit at a time"
Everyone has a choice, we can either follow our dreams and do the things we enjoy and consider meaningful or we can work for someone else and forgo our own ideas.
Doing what we like usually takes more time, work, risks and investments, but you will never know what you can achieve, unless you try.
Our dream was to make portable and computer games. We are willing to work hard to make our dreams a reality. And we would like to create a platform for other people to follow their own dreams while working with us.

Funding goals

All funds will be used to purchase hardware (for testing and building the game), developer account fees (for game publishing) and the rest will be used to promote the game on the web (Google ads, Facebook promotion, etc.).
Your support will heavily influence where the game will be published and what devices will be able to run it. 
The following table explain funding goals, depending on the necessary hardware, software, account fees and over all difficulty of the port and testing. Based on the funds collected, the game will be published for the following platforms. A list of necessary items is given for each platform.

  100 $ - Sphereus Unleashed will be published for Android

  • Developer account
  • 7" tablet for testing (Google Nexus 7)

 1200 $ - Sphereus Unleashed will be published for iOS

  • OS X computer (either MacBook or iMac)
  • iPad or iPhone for testing
  • iOS Developer account

 1500 $ - Sphereus Unleashed will be published for Windows

  • Windows developer account
  • Windows RT and Windows 8 tablet for testing

Perks and features

Now that I have explained what I need to publish the game, there is time to explain what I can offer supporters.
  1. First and foremost, the game gets published and you can play it. Also, you can influence where it will be published (platforms)
  2. Second, those who pledge five Euros or more will get the premium version of the game for free with all features fully unlocked.
  3. Third, the biggest supporters will earn a place in credits to commemorate their generosity and trust in this game.
For more details on perks, check the Perks section.

Release dates

The game is finished and it is ready to be released. The release dates depend on the operating system, since it is currently tested only for Android. The game is ready to be ported but it will require further testing for all the other platforms. The following table lists the expected dates when the game will be released, if the appropriate goals are reached (funds collected).

 July 2015 - the game is finished and tested

 Fall 2015 - the game is portable, it has to be tested and published

 Winter 2015 - the game is already ported but more testing is needed

The release for iOS and Windows will require porting the game and extensive testing to make sure that it is playable and that it plays similar to the Android version. Porting the game will not be that difficult, because it was designed to be portable from the beginning, but adapting it to the specific platforms might require tweaks and modifications. This is the reason, the release dates are not set more precisely for iOS and Windows.

Other help

There are other ways you can help me get this game published or create more games.
Share this campaign with friends. Share Sphereus Unleashed homepage or our other official pages (Google+ community, Play store link etc.).
You can share your work with me, especially audio tracks, textures or models, and I will try to incorporate it to Sphereus Unleashed or my future games.
story_txt:
Sphereus Unleashed  

Sphereus Unleashed is an action game with elements of a puzzle and arcade game. 

In Sphereus Unleashed, you are an alien probe that got caught by a wormhole and pulled through space and time. The wormhole thrusts you directly towards a black hole, the oblivion of all matter. Luckily for you, the strange dimension near the black hole is filled with debris, other objects and mysterious dark matter. By devouring dark matter you've got a chance to break free from the deadly black hole.




The player controls an alien sphere with the goal to gain as much mass as possible. The player can consume the black hole itself once he has reached critical mass. At that point he becomes a dark star. The sphere is controlled by changing the direction of the gravitational pull, which controls the sphere's movement direction and speed.



My name is Michal Brabec and I am a game designer and programmer from Czech Republic. Making games was always my dream and this is the first game I have finished to the point that it is ready for release. I am the founder and creator of my own little game studio 1-bit Barbecue.
Help me publish my game for Android, iOS, Windows and other platforms by funding the required hardware and developer accounts necessary to publish the game. Your support not only helps me to publish this game, but it also allows me to make more games in the future and publish them as well.

My studio has the motto: "You either do what you love or you don't." Your contributions will help me do what I love.

Mission of 1-bit Barbecue

"You either do what you love or you don't.""Turning dreams into reality, one bit at a time"

Everyone has a choice, we can either follow our dreams and do the things we enjoy and consider meaningful or we can work for someone else and forgo our own ideas.Doing what we like usually takes more time, work, risks and investments, but you will never know what you can achieve, unless you try.


Our dream was to make portable and computer games. We are willing to work hard to make our dreams a reality. And we would like to create a platform for other people to follow their own dreams while working with us.

Funding goals
All funds will be used to purchase hardware (for testing and building the game), developer account fees (for game publishing) and the rest will be used to promote the game on the web (Google ads, Facebook promotion, etc.).
Your support will heavily influence where the game will be published and what devices will be able to run it. 
The following table explain funding goals, depending on the necessary hardware, software, account fees and over all difficulty of the port and testing. Based on the funds collected, the game will be published for the following platforms. A list of necessary items is given for each platform.

Developer account

7" tablet for testing (Google Nexus 7)




 1200 $ - Sphereus Unleashed will be published for iOS



OS X computer (either MacBook or iMac)

iPad or iPhone for testing
iOS Developer account



 1500 $ - Sphereus Unleashed will be published for Windows



Windows developer account

Windows RT and Windows 8 tablet for testing

Perks and features
Now that I have explained what I need to publish the game, there is time to explain what I can offer supporters.



First and foremost, the game gets published and you can play it. Also, you can influence where it will be published (platforms)


Second, those who pledge five Euros or more will get the premium version of the game for free with all features fully unlocked.


Third, the biggest supporters will earn a place in credits to commemorate their generosity and trust in this game.

story:
About Me & The Campaign

Hi everyone, I’m a developer from South Africa who for the most part develops SQL / C# solutions for a living. Ever since I was a kid I always said I’m going to write a game one day when around one year ago I decided to tick it off my bucket list, started teaching myself and developing part time.

I know I probably should have started off with a simple single player game for my first attempt but I don’t really play much single player games and really couldn’t relate to it so here we are…

Clash started off as a LAN game but after some thought and discovering some great new break troughs in the development community I realized that with not much changes I will be able to turn Clash into a Multiplayer Online Battle Arena.

I’m very passionate about game development and should Clash be successful it could be the start of more titles and even the start of a Game Studio in South Africa which is in short supply. 


Your Contributions

Contributions will go to the following:

1.  Game-play Server: 1 year: 1,140.00 USD.

2.  Authentication Servers: If Clash is Greenlit I will be able to make use of Steam's authentication/friends/chat system. If not my est. cost for authentication/friends/chat servers is between 540.00 to 1500.00 USD for 1 year.

3. Game Assets: Purchasing 3D models and other game assets (contributors unique droid model, Alien Monument, space station assets and more...)

4.  Advertising (If needed): My main concern is to have enough players online at any given time to make the game viable (A multiplayer game will die fast if you log on and there is no one to play against). My aim is to have 100+ active players at all time. You guys can help me with this by Voting for Clash on Steam Greenlight, spreading the word and sharing Clash on Facebook & Twitter.

3.3  Support & Polish: If anything remains it will go towards me taking some unpaid leave from work during the public beta to give Clash my undivided attention working on bug fixes, adding additional perk content, adding match stats, ranked play and integrating Clash with Steam authentication/friends/chat.


About The Game

CLASH is an INDIE Tactical Third Person Shooter that requires teamwork, tact and skill to defeat the opposing team in a 2v2 or 4v4 Multiplayer Online Battle Arena. 

ACTION

Have all the fun of a classic fast pace third person shooter with some added strategic elements. 

STRATEGY

No basic attack. No auto damage increase, everything relies on how the player combines skills and upgrades optimizations as the match progress to counter and demolish the enemy team. 

TEAMWORK

Fight alongside your team and upgrade your droid to compliment your team’s strategy. 

ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES

The optimization and skill systems allow endless combinations and possibilities. As Clash grows more classes, skills and optimizations will be added. 

UNLOCKABLE CONTENT

Match victory will award you with currency to unlock new Classes, Skills, Skins, Droids (Animated Humanoid & Spider Style Droids) and more. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a contribution it doesn't mean you can't help me make Clash a success. As I mentioned above my major concern is that I will not have enough players online make Clash a viable Multiplayer Online Battle Arena. Your vote on  Steam Greenlight and using the Indiegogo share tools provided will go a long way in helping me make Clash a success.

Thanks for taking the time to read through my campaign Happy Gaming. You can follow me on www.ultimagames.net

story:
Introducing: THE MOVIE GAME™

The Movie Game (TMG) is ready-to-publish and challenge the imagination of gamers worldwide! 

With your help we are launching what could become a part of the next big wave in family board gaming.  TMG is designed for players ages 14 to adult and bridges the gap between classic board games and the mobile game space by connecting them together in a highly innovative and unique way.   

          

Our new board game builds on the success of the original 1981 TMG classic that launched coast-to-coast and sold out in over 500 stores, plus captured the attention of The Wall Street Journal.

         

"The Movie Game™ combines the best of both gaming worlds by embracing classic board game play features where friends and family come together in their own living rooms... connected with the power of Net/Boarding™ that literally brings our new board game to life."



About "The Movie Game"

TMG sold out in over 500 department stores when first published in 1981. We thought it was time to take another look, and we realized that this time all of the inter-active power of the internet could make our game a truly unique experience.


This is a game about what it takes to put a movie together in Tinseltown. Rather than explain in detail how the game works, I think I'll allow The Wall Street Journal to have the honors, just as they did when the game was originally released.

Excerpt below:

"The object of the movie game is to become the first player to make a film, get three foreign distributors and reach the screen. But to make the movie, a player has to pay dearly for a writer ($250,000), producer ($500,000), director ($750,000), and star ($1 million). The final ingredient, a studio deal comes free.

In moving around the Monopoly-like game board (via dice and game cards), players collect money ranging from $50,000 as a minor reward, up to $200,000 for a major network television deal. But they also have to ante up $25,000 in legal fees or 20% of all cash in hand for a "personal manager fee".

Along the way, the budding movie moguls attend countless meetings, just like their real-life counterparts. Says one meeting card: "Your meeting is at the altar, where you marry into an old Hollywood family; go to the square of your choice."

   

  • Imagine playing TMG at home, rolling the dice... and then being connected to a Hollywood Celebrity! 
  • Or on your next play, winning a TMG guest pass to see your favorite movie. 
  • Or, (if the film biz is your thing), winning a personalized face-to-face Skype call with an experienced casting executive, or special effects creator, or well known writer, producer or director. 
  • Or, if you have a Smartphone... uploading your TMG audition while playing the board game, and then TMG players around the world "liking" your performance. 
  • Or being rewarded for watching a movie trailer on your cell phone.   And better yet, our list keeps on growing because imagination is really just the beginning.

  

However, you don't have to be in show biz to play or win The Movie Game.  The movie game is NOT a trivia game and that’s what makes our game come alive for every player. 

It's your choice with every roll of the dice; play the classic board game or mix it up and connect with www.TheMovieGame.com to test your luck and skills. So why not have your own "Movie Game Party" and invite your friends to play the game.  For your first game we'll even supply the popcorn if you invite the players! Just use the special QR code in your game to register!  It's all part of The Movie Game’s magical portal experience with your exclusive connection to TheMovieGame.com and our ability to capture players "live" using our Net/Boarding™ play features.

                       

  

Things we think you should know about our company and the board game industry:

Today, the board game business is on a roll with five consecutive years of double digit growth publishing 30 million board games each year with nearly $2 billion in annual sales. Another real growth industry is the mobile game business with 2015 sales of $31 billion and projected growth to over $40 billion by 2017. 

Did you know... "The board game business is booming!"

Lester Holt with NBC NEWS says..."The "Golden Age of Games" is what they're calling it!  People are turning off their cell phones and putting away their iPads to reconnect on a human level, and it's board games leading the charge to fill that void."  {click to watch the Lester Holt NBC News Report} 

Special Perks - Early bird supporters receive a 33% discount per game! Plus, TMG players are eligible for film fan rewards too!

A personal note from Frank

And The Movie Game was born!

It has taken thousands of work hours to achieve the results we wanted. In this regard, The Movie Game™ is NOT a trivia game.  We are a real life wheeling/dealing fast paced roll-the-dice game best described word for word below by The Wall Street Journal.

Remember, we’ve tested the market and we've analyzed the market, and we know what's trending.  And now, we’re ready to stake our own claim with one foot in the board game business and the other in the mobile game arena. Together, (with your help) we are ready to take the next evolutionary steps. 

Today, an amazing 34 years later, we are here to share with you the new design and innovative game play features that only the newest streaming technology has made possible.  Our new Net/Boarding™ connectivity and 2015 version of TMG is a state-of-the-art board game product with features that enable players to be a part of the real Hollywood by making their own dreams come true.  

Our excitement is genuine and we are ready to manufacture in the USA using the highest standards, and a manufacturer with more than five decades of experience making board games.  And to get the ball rolling, we are offering a limited number of games to our first early bird supporters at a significant 33% pre-order discount for helping us rev up the production engines.  In this regard, our game will retail for $74.95 plus shipping and handling. Early supporters save $25 dollars per game ordered with pre-Holiday 2015 deliveries now being scheduled. Once our crowd funding campaign starts (Tuesday, August 18th), you will have a limited number of days to get in on the first publishing run to print before the Holidays. Remember, you can only become a TMG Club Member if you own and register the game.  As our game will be exclusive to purchase directly from us, orders placed during the campaign will be fulfilled on a first come basis through to the end of the year.

Thank you for your support!

In this regard, now is the time for you to take a few minutes to screen our "TMG Presents" video (click this link) and then get ready to "Take a meeting" with our creator Frank Sacks", In this 3 minute behind-the-scenes video he'll give you a Sneak Preview of The Movie Game and share his personal story with a few fun surprises along the way. 

Check out our game plan and our anything-but-ordinary perks and our unique track record for making successful feature films, and turning books and games (including two of the books below that Frank wrote and produced) into feature films for HBO and Columbia. Extreme Justice & Nico the Unicorn have combined views on YouTube now totaling more than one million.


By supporting us today, you will become part of The Movie Game's founder community and a part of the global opportunity to take the next step in the board game renaissance and The Movie Game’s box office success.

  

"The Movie Game" board game will provide every person who has ever dreamed of making it big in Tinseltown the opportunity to realize that goal… but that’s only half the story, or in this case, half the game. The 2015 updated Net/Boarding™  version gives each player landing on a “Movie Game” square the chance to use a smartphone and capture the “QR” bar code printed on a special TMG game card.

Once connected, this moment could become the most memorable event in a player’s life as our server harnesses the power of connecting every registered TMG player with the desire of Hollywood to build a bridge to each player.

For example, a player could watch a new film trailer and be rewarded with (for example) an AMC theatre pass.  Or, a year’s free subscription to Netflix, or, a player might be asked to read lines from a movie script, all of it captured on your smartphone for other players worldwide to vote on how you did!  The best players will win select prizes, or pick up a bonus that advances them further along the game board.   

As we grow, our broadcast studio at www.TheMovieGame.com will expand and who knows where imagination will take us, maybe we'll get MTV to move over and make room for  a newcomer.  If not, that's OK as we don't need anyone else's permission to have our own internet TMG broadcasting channel. The fact is... audiences are leaving the TV world and shifting their entertainment preferences to what's showing on the Net.  And that's precisely where we want to be with our own broadcasting channelled through TheMovieGame.com and your Net/Boarding™ connected board game.  On our channel you (the TMG Club Member and player) can be both an audience and a broadcaster.  Why wait to be discovered when we can put your future in your own hands to make your dreams come true. 

 

And who hasn't dreamed of making it big in Hollywood?

That's why we think TMG will appeal to so many people!  In fact, of the 1.5 billion members of FaceBook, 375 million say they love games!  We get it.  We also get that every person on the planet who owns a Smartphone (and we are talking about billions of people), all have in their pocket the ability to shoot HD films 24/7.  TMG wants to reach out and give each one of you that buys the game or becomes a TMG Club Member or registered player, a way for us to bring Hollywood to you. Forget about having to go to LA, you've now got the power to be a movie game winner no matter where you live.

For those outside the industry, I promise you'll learn a lot about the real Hollywood and how movies get made, while having a great time playing this game as we connect you with TMG's community of players from around the world. 

Whether you've "Been there and done that" or always wondered, "What if?", you're going to have a blast with your family and friends when you play The Movie Game as it comes alive and gives you the chance to make your own dreams come true!                                                         

                                                             TIMELINE


        

Risks & Challenges

We've already got a great classic game to build upon and learned from our initial release what the best distribution pattern is for the game.  In other words, we are bypassing the congested retail/wholesale toy scheme and shipping to our players direct.  That's why we've aligned ourselves with the best game manufacturing/fulfillment company in the country.  They can make and ship one game or one hundred thousand games. They've been doing just that for over fifty years.  In addition, we've got the advantage of already having test marketed our classic game with terrific reviews, lots of great press coverage and the best results as the original game sold out in over 500 stores coast-to-coast.  

Shipping first class direct to our players is the way to go even if there's a premium to pay UPS/Fedex who are our exclusive carriers.  This is especially important for those that want to give the game as a Holiday gift.  By taking control of our own destiny we expect nothing less than the best practices in terms of our product and your customer satisfaction.  Our "guarantee" is backed by our "A+" Better Business Bureau rating to make good on our promises to you (our supporters) and to our future TMG players and Club Members. 

Don't forget to check out our videos, especially our {TMG Sneak Preview - TMG Presents} as we have lot's more to show and tell but couldn't possibly squeeze all those graphics, videos and campaign details onto this one page! 

 "Thank you... for taking the time to learn more about our global plans to launch The Movie Game."

Frank

Once connected, this moment could become the most memorable event in a player’s life as our server harnesses the power of connecting every registered TMG player with the desire of Hollywood to build a bridge to each player.
For example, a player could watch a new film
trailer and be rewarded with (for example) an AMC theatre pass.  Or, a year’s free subscription to Netflix, or, a player might be asked to read lines
from a movie script, all of it captured on your smartphone for other players worldwide to vote on how you did!  The best
players will win select prizes, or pick up a bonus that advances them further
along the game board.   
As we grow, our broadcast studio at www.TheMovieGame.com will expand and who knows where imagination will take us, maybe we'll get MTV to move over and make room for  a newcomer.  If not, that's OK as we don't need anyone else's permission to have our own internet TMG broadcasting channel. The fact is... audiences are leaving the TV world and shifting their entertainment preferences to what's showing on the Net.  And that's precisely where we want to be with our own broadcasting channelled through TheMovieGame.com and your Net/Boarding™ connected board game.  On our channel you (the TMG Club Member and player) can be both an audience and a broadcaster.  Why wait to be discovered when we can put your future in your own hands to make your dreams come true. 
 

And who hasn't dreamed of making it big in
Hollywood?
That's why we think TMG will appeal
to so many people!  In fact, of the 1.5 billion members of FaceBook, 375 million say they love games!  We get it.  We also get that every person on the planet who owns a Smartphone (and we are talking about billions of people), all have in their pocket the ability to shoot HD films 24/7.  TMG wants to reach out and give each one of you that buys the game or becomes a TMG Club Member or registered player, a way for us to bring Hollywood to you. Forget about having to go to LA, you've now got the power to be a movie game winner no matter where you live.
For those outside the industry, I promise
you'll learn a lot about the real Hollywood and how movies get made, while
having a great time playing this game as we connect you with TMG's community of players from around the world. 
Whether you've
"Been there and done that" or always wondered, "What if?",
you're going to have a blast with your family and friends when you play The
Movie Game as it comes alive and gives you the chance to make your own dreams
come true!                                                         
                                                             TIMELINE





        





Risks & Challenges

We've already got a great classic game to build upon and learned from our initial release what the best distribution pattern is for the game.  In other words, we are bypassing the congested retail/wholesale toy scheme and shipping to our players direct.  That's why we've aligned ourselves with the best game manufacturing/fulfillment company in the country.  They can make and ship one game or one hundred thousand games. They've been doing just that for over fifty years.  In addition, we've got the advantage of already having test marketed our classic game with terrific reviews, lots of great press coverage and the best results as the original game sold out in over 500 stores coast-to-coast.  
Shipping first class direct to our players is the way to go even if there's a premium to pay UPS/Fedex who are our exclusive carriers.  This is especially important for those that want to give the game as a Holiday gift.  By taking control of our own destiny we expect nothing less than the best practices in terms of our product and your customer satisfaction.  Our "guarantee" is backed by our "A+" Better Business Bureau rating to make good on our promises to you (our supporters) and to our future TMG players and Club Members. 

Don't forget to check out our videos, especially our {TMG Sneak Preview - TMG Presents} as we have lot's more to show and tell but couldn't possibly squeeze all those graphics, videos and campaign details onto this one page! 
 "Thank you... for taking the time to learn more about our global plans to launch The Movie Game."
Frank

story:
What is Card Arcade (the previous title)?

Currently available on both Windows 8/10 and Windows Phone, not using a specific game engine, this game is coded natively for these platforms. The game has been highly popular and featured on several Windows and Windows Phone tech sites during it's time in the stores. We have received a lot of positive feedback that has lead us to pursue a follow up title to the game, Card Arcade 3D. The current game offers players several games including Memory, Blackjack, Go Fish, War, Karma and Old Maid.

What is Card Arcade 3D?

Following up on the success of Card Arcade, work has begun on Card Arcade 3D. The game is using the Unity3D game engine and is being planned for release on Steam, iOS, Android, Windows Phone, Xbox One and PlayStation 4. The game carries on the same theme of the previous game, a hub full of different card games. The game is set to include the same card games seen in the previous version with many improvements, but is also set to include many additional games depending on funding levels reached.

What new games will be included if funding is received?

On top of the existing games being remade for the new version, we will be including:

- Canasta
- A variation of Skip-Bo
- A variation of Phase-10
+ more..

What makes Card Arcade different/special?

There is currently nothing of this scale available that is cross platform. We plan to make some of the games playable multiplayer across a Wi-Fi network and online, across platforms (with the exception of Xbox One and PS4 not being cross platform). Our goal is to make a game you can pick up and play solo or play any of your friends, without worrying about what OS they are running on their phone.

Unlike any other titles currently available, we also aim to make your Card Arcade 3D stats and game progress sync across devices (again with the exception of Xbox One and PS4). Start your game on your phone and then pick up game progress on your tablet or pc.

What is the timeframe for the game?

Providing we don't come across any platform specific hurdles, we are aiming for a December release date for the game.

Why Indiegogo?

Game development is a costly venture including game assets/resources and development time. Card Arcade 3D takes our games to a whole new level and we want to make sure we can do it right!

Having this project on Indiegogo allows us to raise funds we can put directly back in to game development. The more funds we raise, the more games and game modes we can include in the initial release. The funding will also allow us to purchase additional development hardware and testing hardware to help us polish the game and ensure it is well tested before it's release.

Why are you not asking for much funding?

Card Arcade 3D has just started being developed. As such, the funding goal we have set is the minimum we ideally require to help us obtain some additional development and testing hardware for the game. We are however going to be setting stretch goals throughout the campaign, with more game content being added for each stretch goal, both on launch and after launch in DLC packs. Funding levels will also have an impact on what games will receive online play capabilities.

About Us

We are an Australian software development business. We've published several self published titles and some third party titles. Our self published titles (primarily Card Arcade & Wheel of Wealth) have built up close to 700,000 downloads and maintain a 4+ average star rating.

About Perks

Picked a perk that involves you being turned in to a game character? Below is a sample of 2 of our employees ready to go in the game. Please note: Opponent characters are a 2d image embossed on the table to show who the opponent player is.

All possible placements for business exposure/static advertisements in the game when selecting the business advertising perk or earlybird perk

Risks and challenges

Ability to test across a wide range of devices. We are planning a wide platform range on launch and as such funding only goes so far. The more funding we receive, the more devices we can obtain for testing the game prior to development, along with future updates to the game.

We are in the ID@Xbox program for publishing to Xbox. However the ability for us to publish this title to the Xbox one will require Microsoft to sign off on the title as it goes through it's development cycle.

story:
The Easy Way to Big Data™

Our world in becoming increasing complex and our challenges significantly larger.

But most of us do not have a large technical staff and IT budget to embrace many of the new products that are allowing us to address challenges head on.   Even large organizations are challenged working with the vast amounts of data. Now there is an easier way to take advantage of all the information you have access to, including unstructured data.  

Websheets simplifies working with Big Data.  Use familiar spreadsheet skills to harness new technology to overcome the data limits of traditional spreadsheets. You can now manipulate and analyze billions, even trillions, of records in milliseconds.  Websheets allows you to use big data technology like Hadoop, Spark and social (graph) databases without having to learn new skills.  

Websheets converts traditional spreadsheet formulas into elastic computations that auto-distribute across all allocated servers to allow you to do what you need to do without data limits.  

Big data is “the next frontier for innovation, competition, and productivity”.  

This reality and my firsthand exposure to helping organizations wrangle their growing amount of data inspired me to create Websheets.  Too much money and time is spent relating data to disparate sources, cleaning up data, and trying to overcome the limits of traditional spreadsheets.  There's no surprise that the number of data scientists and big data professionals will not keep pace with demand.  

To date, I have a working prototype. But I'm ready to take the product to the next level.  I need your help to offer The Easy Way to Big Data. 

Conceptually, here's how it works:

Here's how you can help:

1. Get involved. If you want to flatten the technology playing field, contact me on how you can help.

2. Donate. Help me prove to investors this is a worthy cause.

It’s time for a new spreadsheet. Help me give the world tools to make a better world. It’s time for Websheets.

Make Your Voice Count

Even Exponential Organizations need fuel to light fire.  Right now, I'm a one man show (and a lousy dancer).  If you can't share you're talent, make a difference by showing investors that there is a need.  Show them you understand where the world is headed and want to be prepare.  

To get involved, email info@websheet.io.  To voice your interest, donate here.  

Risks & Challenges

The greatest risk I see is that people don't know what they don't know (go figure). We are 1% of the way through the Information Revolution (source). Things are about to heat up.  How informed and prepared are you?  Do you think traditional vendors will sell you the tools to succeed or keep you on the upgrade train, stifling your organizational agility and competitiveness?

Yes, there are risks and challenges!  But not addressing the oncoming risks and challenges is even worse.  

Here's are next steps:

  • Over this month, I will consider suggestions on incentives.
  • Take ideas on revenue strategies. My strategy is solid. But your ideas might also help fuel funding continual development of a free product. 
  • Work with developers, innovators, and business professionals
  • Raise funds on your proof (if necessary)

story:
PLEASE DON'T LEAVE  WITHOUT  PLEDGING ! :(

                                       Chasing Madea              

I Hope you liked the video in the beginning . It's pretty funny !

Hello ! My name is AJ, and I'm the creator of "Chasing Madea". Before I get started, I would like to thank you for taking the time to visit my project. This project is a game that will be based on the actor Tyler Perry aka "Madea" . Tyler Perry made alot of comedy movies, and he played as the character "Madea", which made his movies a hit ! Madea is known as the funny person,the bad guy or as I would say, the "trouble maker".  I'm creating this game where you will play as a cop, and you'll have to chase down Madea. Each level that you complete, you'll earn +100 points. To start this game, I'll need at least $10,000, and that's to pay for the creation of the game,and the marketing. I want the game to be as realistic as possible, so I'll need as much help from you to give you the best quality. You will enjoy the game once it's finished. The game will be available to download for android and apple users. ALL donations will be greatly appreciated. My main goal is to create my first app,and make it successful. So fasten your seat belts,and enjoy the this adventure. please share to your social media networks,and have them donate,and be apart of the team as well

                 Let's Make this come to life !

My main goal is to bring excitement, and happiness to all of the Madea fans from all over the world, including myself. I plan on adding more characters to the game,so that it can be more exciting.  There will 40+ levels to complete,and they will start to get harder,but that's the whole point of the game. ALL of the fans know that it's pretty tough trying to catch up to Madea.

                  Where I Stand Today ?

I have everything ready. I have all of the documents that will be used to get the game created. I have a small team that's working along with me throughout this project. I have all of the tools that I possibly need to complete this project. I'm only missing one thing,and that's YOU YOU YOU ! 

 When will the game be created ?

After the project is successfully funded, I will make arrangements to get the game created. I want the game to be created,and out on the market by June,2015. If you purchase the email alerts, you will be notified before, and after the game has reached the market.

   I AM CONFIDENT ! ARE YOU ?

I have all of the confidence in the world. I know that this project will be a success. My father use to tell me this quote ' The power of being successful starts within self confidence".

$5

Pledge because you want to see this project become successful !

$10 

You will be notified periodically before and after the game is published. Stay tuned for the GIVEAWAY at the end of the project. 

Chasing Madea T-shirt

$20

 Brand:Gildan Ultra Cotton T-shirt

Sizes & Fit: YXS-4XL. Generous fit
  • 6.1 oz. 100% pre-shrunk cotton; Heather, Antique, and Safety colors are poly/cotton blends
  • Ladies option is the Gildan Ultra Cotton Ladies T-shirt
  • Sturdy heavyweight cotton
  • Double-needle stitched for durability
  • Huge color selection

Are You ready to join the team ? I hope so ! you won't regret pledging to this project. Once  the game is created, You'll be able to tell EVERYONE that you helped create it. 

It was an honor having you here today :) Keep smiles on your faces, and be confident !

Please pledge and share to ALL of your social media networks as possible. Help me help you. I will give you the best quality that I have to give.

Follow me on Instagram :https://instagram.com/chasingmadea/

I would like to thank you once again. You are Awesome ! and don't forget to Pledge, and share. Thank you ! :) :)

Risks and challenges

I WON'T GIVE UP ! I WON'T GIVE UP ! 
What happens if I don't meet our fundraising goal? I'm still going through with it – so you might as well join me for the ride! I want to be able to give you the best coolest app I have to offer, that’s why I'm asking you to join me in this journey from very early on. The more you give, the more I have to give back to you!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Who am I?

Dear friends, my name is Kim Chulmin (a.k.a. KCM). I have been casting matches between professional gamers, mostly on Korean television, since 2001. The Starcraft: Brood War (SC:BW) fans among you may remember me mostly from broadcasts of the MBC Starcraft League (MSL), on which I appeared from its inception to its end. Some of you may better know me from my work as a caster for Starcraft II leagues on SPO TV and OGN.

What is this project?

In recent months, I have organized and broadcast the KCM Legend Match (a.k.a. KLM), an event in which three teams of SC:BW pro gamers compete weekly for prizes. So far, I have at times used a combination of my own funds, small sponsorships, and fan donations to pay for the cost of past KLMs.

These matches had exceptional production values, with a casting team composed of myself and similarly-experienced commentators (Kim Carry, Yooi, and Zeus appeared in recent weeks) broadcasting from a studio with staff support. Also, we were able to take advantage of multiple broadcasting platforms that are more accessible to the international audience such as Youtube and Twitch. Recently, we were even able to have the matches simultaneously broadcast in both Korean (link) and English (link). English-language information about these past matches can be found on Liquipedia (link). VODs can be found on my YouTube channel (link).

I hope that you have enjoyed these KLMs and would like to see more of them. This is where you come in! I need your help to continue funding these weekly KLMs.

What is the goal of this project?

My immediate goal is to fund the next few KLMs with the help of the international Starcraft community. However, my ultimate goal is to increase the chances of securing sponsorship deals for SC:BW events in the future by demonstrating that grassroots passion for Brood War is alive and well on a global scale. You have the chance to help improve the perception of SC:BW in the board rooms of Korean corporations.

What We Need & What You Get

100% percent of your donations will go toward prize money for the pro gamers taking part in the KLMs. The cost of an extra week of KLMs is $1000 USD. This means that, if we raise $3409 USD, then $3000 will be used to pay the pro gamers for three more weeks of KLMs and the remaining $409 will be used to reward the gamers for achieving consecutive wins.

Who will be competing?

Here is a partial list of players who have participated in the KCM Legend Matches so far. While we cannot guarantee their participation, past history has demonstrated their willingness to participate barring any conflicts. Other players may also become available as time goes on. This list includes several former champions of major tournaments as well as elite players who were regulars in the finals and semifinals of such events.

  • Terran: Mind ("The Poisonous Viper"), HiyA ("Magikarp"), Iris ("Berserker"), NaDa ("Genius"), Sea ("l'enfant terrible"), sSak ("Big Head"), Piano ("The Specialist"), Mong ("Honey and Chip"), Last ("half-half"), Light ("The Invisible Terran"), Sharp ("Earnest Jo")
  • Zerg: EffOrt ("Immortal Phoenix"), ZerO ("The Little Prince"), hero ("Bisu Killer"), July ("Battle God"), Kwanro ("All-in Bong"), Larva ("Pong-pong Zerg")
  • Protoss: free ("Lightning Emperor"), Shuttle ("Capitalist Monster"), Guemchi ("Oh-my-eyes"), BeSt ("Behemoth"), Movie ("Movie Star"), Tyson ("BS"), Zeus ("Safety-first Protoss")

"Race Survival" Format (Details)

Every week, three teams (Terran, Zerg, Protoss) will compete. Each team has three players. Every week, the players will be selected based on recent results and other factors. The team that was victorious in the previous week returns all of its members and gets an opportunity to win again.

Each team will send out a player as its representative. When a player loses, he is eliminated from that week's competition. The teams will continue sending out new players until they have no remaining players. In the end, only one team will have any players remaining. This team, the last team standing, will take home the prize money.

There is a special perk that will allow you, the fan, to participate in the team selection process. If you contribute an amount that corresponds to this perk, you may nominate a player of your choice! You can even nominate your favorite non-Korean player from Hungary, Poland, China, or any country with a solid internet connection to Korea! If your first choice is not available, then you can nominate a second choice, a third choice, and so on.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone might be in a situation to contribute financially. However, there are many other ways for you to help us as well. You can help get the word out by word-of-mouth and social media. Indiegogo share tools can also be used to send information about the campaign to your friends.

story:
We are FlashPorters: a team of game enthusiasts who share one goal. We want to bring nostalgic Flash games to our smartphones and tablets. Some of the best games that have ever been released in this genre are not available on the App Store and Google Play and we want to change that.

To port these games to another platform, we need to hire one or two programmers and buy the rights of the games. By funding our campaign, you will soon be able to play some of the most addicting and fun games on your mobile phone and tablet. Are you ready for some flash game nostalgia?



The following games are on our to-do list:

  • Warfare 1917
  • IndestructoTank
  • Effing Worms 2
  • Fishy
  • Motherload
  • Storm the House 3
  • Road of the Dead
  • The Last Stand 1 & 2
  • Playing With Fire 2
  • Treasure of Cutlass Reef
  • Epic Boss Fighter
  • Coma
  • Every Day the Same Dream
  • One Button Bob

  • CircloO

If you know about any other great Flash games, send us a message or email us at games@flashporters.com.



Thank You: By contributing two dollars, you will receive a thank you e-mail, updates and a spot in the credits of our first ported game. You will also be able to propose other Flash games by sending us a message.

2x Game Voucher: In addition to the 'Thank You' perk, you will also receive a voucher to download two of our ported Flash games for iOS/Android and you will be given a spot in the credits of all the games that are released by our team.





5x Game Voucher: You will receive a voucher to download five of our ported Flash games for iOS/Android and you will be given a spot in the credits of all the games that are released by our team.

All Games Voucher: You will receive a voucher to download all the ported Flash games on our to-do list for iOS/Android and you will be given a spot in the credits of all the games that are released by our team.





All Games Voucher + Cheats: In addition to the 'All Games Voucher' perk, you will also get access to cheats, extra characters and special items.

Your Own Ported Flash Game: Tell us the Flash game you would like to see ported to iOS/Android and we will do everything we can to make it happen. You will also get the 'All Games Voucher', a special place in the credits and access to all the cheats, extra characters and special items.



$1,650: Once we reach $1,650, we will be able to port at least one (but possibly even two or three) Flash games to iOS and Android. We will conduct a poll for our backers to determine which game will be ported first. It will cost approximately $400 for the rights of the game and $1,000 to port the actual game. $150 will be used to pay a graphic designer and $100 will be used for the Apple Developer program.

$4,950: This goal will allow us to port three (but possibly up to six) Flash games to iOS and Android. We will also build extra levels for one of the games.





$14,850: Once this goal is reached, we can port all the Flash games on our list to iOS and Android. We will als build extra levels and characters for several ported games.

$19,500: New levels and characters will be added to all the games that allow it.

$25,000: We will add online multiplayer to all the games that allow it, including Playing With Fire 2, Warfare 1917 and Fishy.

If you want to get an idea of what our final product will look like, have a look at the following games that have already been ported:

  • Run!!!
  • Bloons TD4
  • Earn to Die 1 & 2
  • Bubble Struggle: Adventures
  • Rebuild
  • Plague Inc.
  • Burrito Bison

  • Swords and Sandals



To reach our campaign goal, we need your help. By telling your friends and family about our mission, you can spread the word and help us make this campaign a succes. You can also follow us on Twitter and like us on Facebook.

http://igg.me/at/flashporters

If you are a designer, programmer or know of any other way to help us, why not join our team? Send us an e-mail at jobs@flashporters.com to tell us about your skills.

The copyright of all Flash games belong to their respective owners. If your game does not belong in our list, please send us an e-mail at games@flashporters.com and we will remove it immediately.

Retro Game Loop 5 by GameAudioSource
Video Games Controller Icons Set​ by macrovector
Swirling Backgrounds by VectorPortal.com
Coma by Atmos Games
Effing Worms 2 by Effing Games
Epic Boss Fighter by Entertainment Forge and GDV Concept
Every Day the Same Dream by Molleindustria
Fishy by XGen Studios
IndestructoTank by Armor Games
One Button Bob by NXT Digital Solutions
Road of the Dead by Evil-Dog Productions
Storm the House 3 by Case Hollingsworth and Robbie Lee
The Last Stand 1 & 2 and Warfare 1917 by Con Artists Productions
Treasure of Cutlass Reef by GameInABottle.com
CircloO by Florian van Strien
Learn to Fly by Light Bringer Games
