story:
Set in a distant future and in a very faraway spot of the universe, where no human being has ever placed his foot. You have a galaxy with more than 50,000 stars to discover, each star system is unique and completely different from the rest,  there is no planet exactly like another one.

 

 

It is not a conventional space game, because apart from piloting spaceships, you can also drive land vehicles, build and rule your space station, make your house and your vehicles.
Fight, explore, mine, command your drones. And this is not all...

 

 

 

Simply get off your ship and explore the world on foot, collect and build with your own hands something that maybe one day you may call home.

Imagine yourself building a base on one of those moons that you visited yesterday in order to wait for a solar flare to subside and collect the plasma so that the fission chamber of your ship has a special fuel that allows you to reach that faraway star?

Or build it on that planet that was on the edge of a black hole full of exotic resources?

Or maybe this time you want to build a wooden cabin next to a lake of that newly discovered planet that reminds you so much of the Norwegian fjords, why not stay a few days to fish and relax a little?

When you have rested, get off your ship and go to the hangar where you will find your ground exploration vehicle ready to drive to that area which was impossible to land and collect as much titanium as you need in order to make a new ship. But do not forget the weapon in the glove compartment when you get out of the vehicle, because it is an area of ​​abominable monsters which would only bow to your powerful weapons.

Once your new ship is built, you will be able to go to the system's Haz-234 asteroid belt. When you get there, the danger alarm is activated, the proximity radar detects artifacts in the area, which are impossible to identify yet. The extraction mining operation of Taaffeita to manufacture new crystals for your laser weapons will have to wait, as these artifacts are ancient surveillance drones of an unknown species that thousands of years ago became extinct, but for some reason their battle machines persevered over time and now they are approaching you in order to protect the old domain of their masters.
The battle will be memorable if you manage to survive...

 

Although OurSpaceRevolution is a space game, nevertheless, it makes everything possible.

Only you and your imagination can put limits to this game.

You can be an explorer, space engineer, hunter, farmer, architect, rewards hunter, pirate, hero, or combine all of these possible roles.

This is a game that combines a spatial theme and OpenWorld.

Depending on the funding raised, a story mode will be made and the multiplayer game mode will be prepared.

Although the Pre-Alpha version will not have a story mode, it is something we want to implement at some point in the Alpha phase. However, we do not only want to have a main story but also introduce other secondary stories and we even want to develop the ones proposed by the players. Even make certain points of the main story with the players.

In other words, the dimension, a variety of games and hours of entertainment and the speed of development that we want to give to this project, will depend in large part on the success that we obtain with this campaign.

 

 

Basically, OurSpaceRevolution has 4 different points to the rest of the videogames, and two of them can be amazing.

 

 

The big difference from most other games is that it is a paid game but you can get it for free and also obtain the items on the game's market for free.

How is that possible ?

When the game is finally released or in alpha version, you will have two ways to get it.

One would be buying it and the other pressing the magic button "which is the free option".

This last option is possible because when you play a video game or use your computer, it does not take full advantage of all the resources, we will take advantage of some of these remaining or residual resources without affecting in any way your user experience.

So if you want to get the game but do not want to spend even a single dollar with this system it is already possible.

The intelligent functions of the system will detect when you do not use the computer, so that it will be used to perform mining operations to mine cryptocurrencies.

In other words, the game is 100% free for you and we eventually get our money back, without affecting your budget at all.

We have had a functional prototype of this remuneration system from January 1, 2018 and it generates benefits each time the demo is tested.

The mining operations will always be carried out trying that these do not affect the quality of your gaming experience, in fact as far as CPU is concerned, we have already optimized it.

But we still want to go further with this system.

Depending on the level of success of the campaign, we will make a development kit so that others can integrate this moneymaking system in their games including other types of applications and programs.

and when we launch the Alpha version of the game, we would like to donate to charities a part of the profits that are produced with our innovative remuneration system.

So if all goes well, not only can you obtain the game for free or free items from the market, but in part you will also be helping people who are in need. 

"video about this in some days" or you can see it in some days at :​ http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new

 

 

Your smartphone has the components that a high level joystick has.

We have developed software so that you can pilot the ships and vehicles with your phone.

It really improves the gaming experience. Taking it to another level and increasing realism when it comes to piloting.

And to make things even better, we have included voice commands. You can activate the protection shields of your ship or launch a missile at the selected target with your voice, as well as command the ship to jump to the nearest star, or tell your ship to turn off all the electronics so that those enemies that are swarming nearby do not detect you.

You can also act as an assistant and voice computer of the ships and vehicles. And your ships will inform you by voice about some of the important events as well as the proximity of enemies, high radiation areas, low fuel, etc.

"video about this in some days" or you can see it in some days at :​
 http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new

 

 

Democracy, if the product comes out the users will have the right to propose new facets of the game, as well as: ideas, upgrades, improvements, new adventures to develop, a new spaceship class, etc.

There will be a voting system to do this.

If some idea is voted by the most and, therefore, considered as a good one, we would be happy to introduce in the roadmap of the game and at some point that idea will be integrated into the game.

Example:

It would be great if you could create a type of shield that would make the ships submerge in the stars, so that the ships could be camouflaged inside them or extract materials to build energy cells "batteries" such as Helium3 Etc.

 

 

 

Our own peripherals will be created for the game.

Apart from transforming the smarthpone into a joystick
we are also developing our own peripherals for our game.
Flight Stick and Throttle. MFD "Cockpit Panels" usb or wireless.
VR gamepads, we will create software so that you can connect your smartphone and use it for VR. We will create VR gloves for more immersion.
In other words, we are going to create a few devices to improve the realism and quality of our game.

And these devices would be really cheap!

How can these devices be cheap?

Because if you want, you can make them yourself. We will publish a guide with very detailed instructions on how to make such devices on our website. You won’t need expensive components and they will be very easy to assemble. We will also provide you with constant support, answering your questions, solving your doubts and inquiries about this game.

and the other option it's You will also be able to buy these devices directly from us.


Note:   In order to do all of that we need to have certain success in our project. "which we specify below".
It doesn’t mean we cannot do that on our own. It is basically one more task to add to our project, which means that we need more time to do it correctly, and therefore we need to enlarge our team to do it.


"video about this in some days" or you can see it in some days at :​
 http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new​

 

1- Everything recorded in the presentation videos is played in real time.

Without any video editing effects. What you see in the presentation videos is the current development version.

 

2- More than half a million planets and moons!

Each celestial body made by hand it's different from the others.
and the others that was made's with procedural system always have diferences from the others. In other words, not exist one planet or one moon exactly equal to other one.

"video about this in some days" or you can see it in some days at :​
 http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new

 

3- Large variety!

Of ships and vehicles, fighters, cruisers, battleships, motorcycles, jeeps, etc., etc.
the ships are divided into 5 sizes, small, medium, big, huge and enormous.
Or S, M, L, XL, XXL.
At the moment we have some of them created, the biggest vessels that we have currently developed are medium size, anyway we have the intention of introducing new ones in each update.

Note : XL and XXL we will do if we have certain success in our project.
"which we specify below".

"video about this in some time" You can see it in:
http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/gameobjects

 

4- Customize!

Tune and modify your ships, put a more powerful shield, change weapons, put smart missiles, put a camouflage module or expand the cargo hold, etc.

 

5- The planets of OurFreeSpace can become gigantic!

you could spend hours flying over some planets.


"video about this in some days" or you can see it in some days at :​
 http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new

 

6- Space battles!

Space is a seemingly empty place but you will find loads of enemies there and you will have to fight with them. So keep your ship well-armed, or make it faster, more resistant, add camouflage modules or prepare it for electronic warfare. Do not get caught off guard!

"video about this in some days" or you can see it in some days at :​
 http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new

 

7- Build with your blueprints!
with blueprints you can build your ships, your land vehicles, build your outpost or house, your weapons, ammunition, new engines and shields for your ships, etc. Buildings do not need blueprints to construct them, you can make them as you wish !


"video about this in some days or in some time" or you can see it in some days at :​
 http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new

 

8- You can carry hand weapons !

Because the planets can be hostile, so you’d better bring a great variety of weapons. As well as various hand tools to build, explore, repair etc.

"video about this in some days" or you can see it in some days at :​
 http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new

 

9- Use extraction tools !

To get materials such as iron, copper, food, etc.

 

10- Create automated machinery !

to extract even more resources than you do with hand tools. Start mining, hunting, fishing, cultivating, etc. Do all this with drones or build special machinery.

"video about this in some time" You can see it in:
 http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new

 

11- Revolutionary Market inventing a new remuneration system that allows you to buy products or simply acquire them for free!

Without advertising, without selling your information to third parties. If you do not want to gather the necessary resources to manufacture your ship and you want to have it straight away, use the Market!

In the market you will find everything you need, your vehicles, weapons etc, and if you do not want to pay for them, simply acquire them for free with the "magic" button.

Example: You want the MK2000X laser turret: You can gather the materials and make it yourself or you can buy it in the market, but you do not want to spend a single dollar, that’s when you can press the "magic" button and in a few minutes you’ll get the laser turret completely free.

 

12- few loading screens !

There are no loading screens when you descend to the planets or moons.
as you can see in the videos.

 

13- Intention to develop a multiplayer mode and also a story mode.

These will be integrated if good financing of the project is acquired. We would also like to be able to develop a version for consoles.

 

14- You can own a planet or a moon or an entire star system !

And have absolute control and sovereignty over it! Without anyone bothering you,  even free of NPC's or being able to control them.


 

15 - Terraforming 

Some planets will be terraformed using terraforming tools to turn an inert world into an authentic paradise.
"video about this in some time" or you can see it in :​
 http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new

 

16 - It's not just a space game!

If we achieve a good level of game financing, there will be special planets.

For example, a planet where you can run ship or land vehicle races. Or a planet for hunters who want to live a survival experience with their separate story, where they can acquire special resources, etc. If all goes well you can propose more special planets.

 

 

 

Is there any difference between the paid version and the free version?

If you choose the free version the frame rate per second is affected, not being able to upload more than 50 frames per second "or less". Nor will a resolution higher than 1080P or similar be allowed, since, depending on the monitor that you have this resolution may vary a bit, and graphics in Ultra mode "which is the maximum limit allowed by the game" will be disabled. The maximum option in the free version is “very high quality”. Which is the penultimate option in graphic quality in the paid version.
The users of the free version won’t be able to vote or propose ideas for the game.
Support team gives priority to the users who got the paid version of the game. Apart from this, everything is going to be the same in the free version.

I bought the paid version, can the special compensation system ever work?

Only if you choose it.  There will be 3 options of special remuneration in the paid version.

1 - In the market.

You decide to buy a laser cannon for your ship " for example, because you do not have time to collect the materials to build it ".
You can pay for it or press the magic button, the weapon will be yours and the system will be mining a few minutes (obviously depending on the object you buy it will take more or less time)

2 - If you want to support us.

 So that we can dedicate more resources in the creation of this game, there will be an option for this. if you choose this option, even having an option just for that, below. We want to contribute a part of the benefits to charitable causes.

 

3 - and finally, as we said before we want to take this system much further,

When the game is fully finished " or at Some point of the Alpha version "
You will also have an option to allocate all the profits from the special remuneration system to a charitable cause, choosing one of the NGOs that decides to collaborate with us.

"We will only admit NGOs that are for humanitarian causes."

 

 

 

We are a small team that wants to grow.
Most aspects of the game are already done, everything you see here
and much more (we will be updating to show more).
Thanks to your support it will soon be possible and we will make a great game.

 

current team:

 

Marti Vidal:  The one who had the idea of this project.
He is in charge of all the programming. He created the prototype device for the game, the mining system, a big part of the 3d designs, turned the mobile phone into a joystick, the person who developed the game´s structure and how the Galaxy is made, etc. 
In other words, everything concerning programming in the game is currently carried out by Martí.


Irina Bespalova:  Translations and linguistic support.
She is Russian, fluent in 3 languages. She lived and worked in the United States. She has been living in Spain for the past 5 years now. 
She will work on translations and give support as a helpdesk.

Jose Mari Sales: Entrepreneur, with a wide experience in the computer world, he is a co-founder of an important entreprise in France that deals with databases.
He is our first investor who was the first one to believe and support this project.
In the future he will take care of the company's operations and management.
Thanks for all, Partner.


see more about us and other collaborators who help us at:
 http://​https://www.ourspacerevolution.com/about-us

 

 

 

 

Apart from what has been already mentioned.

We could also say:

 

This is intended to be a different game, where players can choose the creation of their content.

Because we want to improve the remuneration system in the world of videogames, making it possible for a player to have more options to acquire a product and not just pay money all the time.

So that once and for all everyone can understand that things can change for the better.

Nobody will ever be able to say that playing a video game is a waste of time, because from now on you will also be able to help people in need.
Today with your help we can take videogaming to the next level, thanks to you we will all be able to make a  difference in this world.

 

 

This is the reason why we are so specific about the amounts of money below.
The first two minimum amounts will be to continue working alone on the project.
We are a tiny team working on this project. The team consists of Martí  who is
creating all the game content, as well as doing all the programming, design, generating ideas.

If this is the case, everything will be slower, obviously under such circumstances we won’t be able to do a story mode, or even if we do it, it will eventually happen in a distant future if all goes. Although, to be honest:

Of ships and vehicles, fighters, cruisers, battleships, motorcycles, jeeps, etc., etc.the ships are divided into 5 sizes, small, medium, big, huge and enormous.Or S, M, L, XL, XXL.At the moment we have some of them created, the biggest vessels that we have currently developed are medium size, anyway we have the intention of introducing new ones in each update.Note : XL and XXL we will do if we have certain success in our project."which we specify below"."video about this in some time" You can see it in:http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/gameobjects 4- Customize!Tune and modify your ships, put a more powerful shield, change weapons, put smart missiles, put a camouflage module or expand the cargo hold, etc. 5- The planets of OurFreeSpace can become gigantic!you could spend hours flying over some planets."video about this in some days" or you can see it in some days at :​ http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new 6- Space battles!Space is a seemingly empty place but you will find loads of enemies there and you will have to fight with them. So keep your ship well-armed, or make it faster, more resistant, add camouflage modules or prepare it for electronic warfare. Do not get caught off guard!"video about this in some days" or you can see it in some days at :​ http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new 7- Build with your blueprints!with blueprints you can build your ships, your land vehicles, build your outpost or house, your weapons, ammunition, new engines and shields for your ships, etc. Buildings do not need blueprints to construct them, you can make them as you wish !"video about this in some days or in some time" or you can see it in some days at :​ http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new 8- You can carry hand weapons !Because the planets can be hostile, so you’d better bring a great variety of weapons. As well as various hand tools to build, explore, repair etc."video about this in some days" or you can see it in some days at :​ http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new 9- Use extraction tools !To get materials such as iron, copper, food, etc. 10- Create automated machinery !to extract even more resources than you do with hand tools. Start mining, hunting, fishing, cultivating, etc. Do all this with drones or build special machinery."video about this in some time" You can see it in: http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new 11- Revolutionary Market inventing a new remuneration system that allows you to buy products or simply acquire them for free!Without advertising, without selling your information to third parties. If you do not want to gather the necessary resources to manufacture your ship and you want to have it straight away, use the Market!In the market you will find everything you need, your vehicles, weapons etc, and if you do not want to pay for them, simply acquire them for free with the "magic" button.Example: You want the MK2000X laser turret: You can gather the materials and make it yourself or you can buy it in the market, but you do not want to spend a single dollar, that’s when you can press the "magic" button and in a few minutes you’ll get the laser turret completely free. 12- few loading screens !There are no loading screens when you descend to the planets or moons.as you can see in the videos. 13- Intention to develop a multiplayer mode and also a story mode.These will be integrated if good financing of the project is acquired. We would also like to be able to develop a version for consoles. 14- You can own a planet or a moon or an entire star system !And have absolute control and sovereignty over it! Without anyone bothering you,  even free of NPC's or being able to control them.

 15 - Terraforming Some planets will be terraformed using terraforming tools to turn an inert world into an authentic paradise."video about this in some time" or you can see it in :​ http://www.ourspacerevolution.com/what-s-new 16 - It's not just a space game!If we achieve a good level of game financing, there will be special planets.For example, a planet where you can run ship or land vehicle races. Or a planet for hunters who want to live a survival experience with their separate story, where they can acquire special resources, etc. If all goes well you can propose more special planets.   Is there any difference between the paid version and the free version?If you choose the free version the frame rate per second is affected, not being able to upload more than 50 frames per second "or less". Nor will a resolution higher than 1080P or similar be allowed, since, depending on the monitor that you have this resolution may vary a bit, and graphics in Ultra mode "which is the maximum limit allowed by the game" will be disabled. The maximum option in the free version is “very high quality”. Which is the penultimate option in graphic quality in the paid version.The users of the free version won’t be able to vote or propose ideas for the game.Support team gives priority to the users who got the paid version of the game. Apart from this, everything is going to be the same in the free version.I bought the paid version, can the special compensation system ever work?Only if you choose it.  There will be 3 options of special remuneration in the paid version.1 - In the market.You decide to buy a laser cannon for your ship " for example, because you do not have time to collect the materials to build it ".You can pay for it or press the magic button, the weapon will be yours and the system will be mining a few minutes (obviously depending on the object you buy it will take more or less time)2 - If you want to support us. So that we can dedicate more resources in the creation of this game, there will be an option for this. if you choose this option, even having an option just for that, below. We want to contribute a part of the benefits to charitable causes. 3 - and finally, as we said before we want to take this system much further,When the game is fully finished " or at Some point of the Alpha version "You will also have an option to allocate all the profits from the special remuneration system to a charitable cause, choosing one of the NGOs that decides to collaborate with us."We will only admit NGOs that are for humanitarian causes."   We are a small team that wants to grow.Most aspects of the game are already done, everything you see hereand much more (we will be updating to show more).Thanks to your support it will soon be possible and we will make a great game. current team: Marti Vidal:  The one who had the idea of this project.He is in charge of all the programming. He created the prototype device for the game, the mining system, a big part of the 3d designs, turned the mobile phone into a joystick, the person who developed the game´s structure and how the Galaxy is made, etc. In other words, everything concerning programming in the game is currently carried out by Martí.Irina Bespalova:  Translations and linguistic support.She is Russian, fluent in 3 languages. She lived and worked in the United States. She has been living in Spain for the past 5 years now. She will work on translations and give support as a helpdesk.Jose Mari Sales: Entrepreneur, with a wide experience in the computer world, he is a co-founder of an important entreprise in France that deals with databases.He is our first investor who was the first one to believe and support this project.In the future he will take care of the company's operations and management.Thanks for all, Partner.see more about us and other collaborators who help us at: http://​https://www.ourspacerevolution.com/about-us     Apart from what has been already mentioned.We could also say: This is intended to be a different game, where players can choose the creation of their content.Because we want to improve the remuneration system in the world of videogames, making it possible for a player to have more options to acquire a product and not just pay money all the time.So that once and for all everyone can understand that things can change for the better.Nobody will ever be able to say that playing a video game is a waste of time, because from now on you will also be able to help people in need.Today with your help we can take videogaming to the next level, thanks to you we will all be able to make a  difference in this world.  This is the reason why we are so specific about the amounts of money below.The first two minimum amounts will be to continue working alone on the project.We are a tiny team working on this project. The team consists of Martí  who iscreating all the game content, as well as doing all the programming, design, generating ideas.Another team member is Irina who is in charge of the linguistic support.If this is the case, everything will be slower, obviously under such circumstances we won’t be able to do a story mode, or even if we do it, it will eventually happen in a distant future if all goes. And obviously such time consuming details as multiplayer will have to wait. We can not guarantee what will be done and what won’t be done and when we finally finish the game. Anyway, we will work as much as we can, to make this project possible. Although, to be honest:At the moment we have a lot of work already done.Some spaceships, a mining sistem prototype, the general structure of the game are partially done.The galaxy, star systems, the structure of the planets, the way to generate thousands of planets semi procedurally is also ready. However, not all planets will be handmade, only the planets of property, that is the intention, we have already handmade some moons and planets and the result is very good. The program that transforms the smartphone into a joystick.It works perfectly, and improves a lot the inmersive feelings when you pilot spaceships, really, it's a glory to use it.Nevertheless, there is a huge chunk of work left to be done so far.   30.000 euros or less.-We will try to make a simpler version of the game, without multiplayer. -The pre-alpha will be launched and in each update we will be improving the project step by step.-At some point, an Alpha version will be launched. And we will keep improving until it becomes a finished game.-And trying to launch the full version of the game at some point.-We don't know which functions and game aspects mentioned above will be present with this level of funding.-Nevertheless, we will try to implement them in future updates .-The special remuneration system will be created. But maybe the market not. 60.000 euros.-We will expand the team by hiring some great freelancers to go faster with the development.-Mainly to amplify and give exclusivity to 3D and other designs.-We will make a simplified game version  without multiplayer.-The pre-alpha will be launched and will be updated progressively until reaching an Alpha version.-And trying to launch the full version of the game at some point.-A story mode will be possibly made.-The special remuneration system will be created. But maybe the market not. 150.000 euros.-A company will be created sometime near the end of the campaign.-We will be a bigger group than currently.-The star map will be more extensive we add some special stars.- One or two special plantes like race planet.- We  launch the full version of the game at some point.- Story mode will be made.-It will be updated in the future and enriched with some type of multiplayer mode.-The special remuneration system will be created. And probably the market at some point. 250.000 euros-A company will be created sometime near the end of the campaign or during the course of the campaign.-We will be a medium low team size working on this.-The star map can be increased we add a dwarf galaxy.- two or more special planets like the race planet and hunting planet.- Own planets will  works in multiplayer and in solo mode.- Story mode will be made and some expansions.-Own peripherals will be created for the game "we currently have a prototype to show you about this". And this ones be cheaper ! and really amazing !-You can choose to play solo or in multiplayer mode.-Capital ships will be created, which are like aircraft carriers or mobile space bases.some vessels size XL and one or two  XXL size.-Some planets can be terraformed.-The special remuneration system and market will be created. 500.000 euros.-A company will be created sometime near the end of the campaign or during the course of the campaign.-We will be a medium or medium low team size working on this.-The star map will be increased with other galaxy.-Several special planets will be created. Each of them with different stories.- own planets will  works in multiplayer and in solo mode.- Story mode will be made and some expansions.-Own peripherals will be created for the game "we currently have a prototype of this".And this ones be cheaper ! and really amazing !-You can choose to play alone or in multiplayer mode at  some point of alpha version.-Capital ships will be created, which are like aircraft carriers or mobile space bases. vessels size XL and  XXL size.-Compatibility with VR.-Some planets can be terraformed.-The voting system will be integrated at some point once the game is finished, players can propose new improvements or new content for the game.-The special remuneration system and market will be created. € 1.000.000 euros or more.-All of the above.-We will be a medium  or big team size working on this.-The game will be translated into Spanish, English, Russian, French, German, Chinese, etc.-we add customer service with this languages. to offer a high quality support.-New functions for "gamepad" flight control.-You can use your tablets as an extension controls. For shields, ship systems, sensors, access to the market, etc.-We will create 3 more galaxies apart from the current one.- more ships, more variety, more quality, etc.-The voting system will be integrated in the same Alpha version.-We will have more capacity to carry out more requests from users to improve the game. As   well as large groups that wanted to support us in this project.-The special remuneration system and market will be created.

story:
We are a gaming lounge in Casper, WY that strives to become haven for families and gamers to enjoy doing what they love, playing video games with friends. PowerUp Gaming Lounge was created from the ground up by two people with no help other than their passion for video games and bringing people together. We are currently doing pretty well for being open for a month and a half but have found ourselves playing a game of catch up due to bills instead of being able to make payments in advanced and become more financially comfortable. We hope that this campaign we will kick-start our business so that we will be able to flourish instead of drown. We have so many things that we would love to add in the future. A cafe, a VIP area, and also expand to the downstairs of our rented building. Currently we can only afford a few games on each PC and half of them are free to play games. We would love to have an amazing selection but currently everything we have made has gone to our bills. Also we lose customers because they are not that impressed with our selection. We would love to be able to really be on the forefront of gaming. 

Our mission is to create a community for people who normally would not interact, and give the the opportunity and atmosphere to take a step out of their comfort bubble to make new friends and awesome memories. We have young customers who come in after school in order to wait for their parents to come home from work, a wonderful group of adults with disabilities that come in and have a great time, and families that come in and find that we have something for everyone to play.

We want to do so much more for the gaming community in Casper. We want to be a safe place for parents to allow their kids to come to and a place where people can play the latest games and see if they are something they would like to purchase. The hope is to be a place where the community can come together. A place where people can feel safe and have a lot of fun. We are struggling as first time buisness owners and we could use any help we can get to make this place into what we hope to be amazing.

story:
Where in the world did this idea come from???

Hi! My name is Matt Hayashida.  I'm and InterVarsity Alum from Cal State University, Long Beach.  I spent two years interning with InterVarsity and love the ministry there.  My parents met in AACF (Asian American Christian Fellowship) in college.  And I have dozens of connection to people in Epic/Cru (some from Navs, too).  College ministry has always been very close to my heart.

The concept of CruVarsity Clicker started a few years back when a couple friends and I started a project called Youth Group Sim--a clicker game where you play as a youth pastor trying to grow the largest youth group possible.  We had a blast developing the concept together and scraping together our graphics and code.  CruVarsity Clicker is the spiritual successor to the unfinished game of my college days.

I've always loved games and recently decided to learn programming/Unity (thanks to Covid keeping me cooped up in my room all day).  This past year, a handful of my friends have entered the ministry world and have asked my for support.  Being the jobless boi that I am, I unfortunately had to ask them to wait.  My hope is to use a bit of my creative endeavors to support the friends of mine whose lives I am parodying.

The Story

CruVarsity Clicker is an incremental idle game, which means it's super simple, easy to pick up, and a casual play.  You play as a new Campus Minister who is sent to Idle University.  Your goal is to create a thriving fellowship of students.  You start of as any good Christian should, by praying (tapping the pray button).  Praying increases your faith which you can use to invite students to your fellowship.  Student will passively generate faith and can be upgraded with small groups.

You can host Large Groups to generate vision.  You can upgrade your students into Core Members, then into Leaders.  You can send your student to chapter camp.  And you can have your leaders disciple apprentices.

Eventually you can unlock the fellowship upgrade tree.  With it, you can get a keyboard for the worship team, play some icebreaker games, and become a social media influencer, all to show people the love of Jesus.  These upgrades all increase the effectiveness of your fellowship.

 

After your fellowship is thriving like no other, you can plant a plant at a new campus (the prestige function).  Planting a new campus will give you mission which you can use to recruit interns.  Interns give all kinds of special bonuses and can heavily determine your playstyle.

Additionally, throughout the game you can close your main tabs and look out onto Idle University's quad.  Here you can not only pray for campus, but also find student wandering around and reach out to them.  Tapping on them gives you bonus Faith, Vision, or Mission.

As you plant more and more campuses, your ministry team will grow.  See how many students you can possibly get in your fellowship!

 

What you get if you support

Although I plan to make the game free, if you contribute, you will get early access to the game as well as have you feedback considered in the final product.  Additionally, there are a few more sprites that I have left unfinished.  Supporters at higher levels will be able to put themselves (or someone they know) into the game.

You can be an intern,

An animated student on the quad,

Or you can have your campus be a background for the game!

That's right!  I will put you into this game if you support it!

(check out the perks! They are awesome!)

If CruVarsity Clicker raises enough support, have a couple stretch goals in mind.  If this campaign really hits it off, we could do all sorts of things.  I'm open to suggestions, haha

 

Development Costs

Because the game is 95% developed, there are basically no development costs left.  All visuals are custom made by me.  And all sound has generously been done by a couple of my friends.  The developer's fee for the app stores is the only cost that remains.  Aside from those, everything that this campaign makes will be donated to various friends of mine who are in different ministries (if you are curious about which ones, you can ask me directly).

I plan to make this game free to download on both the Google Play Store and the App Store.  The publisher fee for those are $25 and $99 respectively.  Everything beyond that will go to people in ministry

Timeline

December, I will finish up the artwork based on people who support this Campaign.  Make sure you get those perks while they last, if you want to be in the game!

That means first week in January will release the closed beta.  Soon after that, I will apply for publishing on the various app stores.

By the end of January, The game will hopefully be approved and free to download for everyone.

Going forward: I loved the development process of this game.  Who knows, maybe I'll make another.  Let me know if you think I should :D

Risks & Challenges

Getting this game into the Apple App store might prove difficult.  Given that this is an indie game, we shall see how hard the approval process is.  Also, I don't have a Mac, so I'll need to outsource some of the development.  Other than that, the challenges are behind me.  

What can you do?

I'd love for you share this with your friends.  Share this with you college pastor.  Share this with your students.  Share this with your friends in ministry.  Share this to the Babylon Bee.  Anyone who appreciates a little ministry parody will be sure to get a kick out of this project.  

I'd also hope that seeing this campaign gives you a little prophetic tingle--that sense that something about how our culture does ministry is a little funny... not the good sort of funny.  I've been learning how important it is to step away from models of ministry that are all about numbers and growth and into ministry that builds deep relationships.  I hope that playing this game will make you just a little bit uncomfortable with the ways we are tempted into the American corporate schema of doing ministry—the one that tries to get as many numbers as possible, the one that treats Church as a business formula—and push you to take a stand against that.

story:
Hi! I'm Alicia: just your ordinary IT professional. 

Because of my passion for IT, I always ask, "What IT solution I use that will improve the overall experience of my life, or the lives of the people I work with, the community I live in, and the world we share?"

When we are financially blessed, it's OK to raise our standard of living; but we must also raise our standard of giving.

Getting a little creative this time with my extra-curricular IT efforts, I developed a couple of environmental conservation themed games for the iOS platform. 

Love our Coral Triangle for the Coral Triangle Center who is helping to restore our Amazon of the Sea in Southeast Asia:
· 76% of the world’s coral species are found here,
· 6 out of 7 of the world’s sea turtle types call this area home as well,
· 37% of all reef fish species in the world reside here:
· 130 MILLION people also depend on these resources!

Each game has a Know The Animal section educating us on why these animals are endangered, and how conservation helps.

We have seen success with the iOS games, so it seems only fair to give the Android community access to these educational games and awareness of their causes.

Development cost for the game is around USD $5,000

Gaming for a better world is our slogan.

When you back this project, I will personally send you a digital video made with my underwater camera! This will give you a first-hand look at these special places illustrating why they deserve our awareness and protection.

Now, it’s your turn to show us:

  • by backing this campaign, plus
  • we have a whole list of goodies to give you as a way of saying thank you for helping us
  • spread the education and awareness internationally
  • with the Android version of these special games!

Check out the Level-Up 4 Good website for what I hope to achieve through games!

Thank you for your interest & support as a Backer! :D    ~> Tell your friends…

Alicia Choo
Founder & Chief Games4Good Guru
levelup4good.com

*Click here for detail terms and conditions for the USD3000 perks
