spread the education and awareness internationally

with the Android version of these special games!
Check out the Level-Up 4 Good website for what I hope to achieve through games!Thank you for your interest & support as a Backer! :D    ~> Tell your friends…Alicia ChooFounder & Chief Games4Good Gurulevelup4good.com*Click here for detail terms and conditions for the USD3000 perks

story:
I-Race Games needs additional funds to complete our new Blazing Silks Facebook game "Blazing Silks - High Stakes Racing" and to create related Blazing Silks mobile games.  Are you ready for the new Blazing Silks game? I know we are!

If this is your first time on Indiegogo, then let us explain that this is a "crowdfunding" campaign where a lot of people give a little bit of money and it adds up to a lot of money.  So we are just asking that people give a few dollars. So, for example, if all of our active customer's gave just  $5 we would have enough money to get this game done! And with the perks below you would get $20 of in-game currency $10 in this game and $10 in the next game...it is easy money for our players!!  

If you just want to give $5 click here.  If you want to give $25 click here.  If you want to give $100 click here.  To see more perks look on the left side of the screen and scroll down.

If you are interested in giving more we have all kinds of cool perks and prizes (including tickets to this years Breeders' Cup) for those who can afford more.  Plus, if you want to just leverage your network of friends - we have a contest where the people who refer the most friends and money will get cool prizes - the Grand Prize being tickets to next years Breeders Cup.  

We have been working for over a year to create our new game; we took all of our learning, mounds of your feedback and game improvement ideas, and produced this completely new version of "Blazing Silks” called “High Stakes Racing”.  We are very proud of this new game and it has improved game-play in the areas you have come to love as well as many exciting new elements that have been encouraged by our fan-base. 

The goal of this new game is to build the greatest horse racing breeding and racing empire in our virtual world. It focuses on building a bloodline over many generations to breed one or more ultimate Breeders’ Cup Champions.

This game will have these key features, plus a whole lot more:
  • New core game “cycle” that includes crafting and resource management.  You can care, feed, train, and equip your horses and jockeys.  You can staff and maintain your farm.
  • Expanded racing challenges – with over twenty gorgeous tracks and hundreds and hundreds of racing challenges  - the single player campaign will take months to finish.
  • Interactive Racing – we are going to let you take the reins and see your favorite Breeders’ Cup tracks from the best seat in the house.
  • Everything has been improved and made more comprehensive: breeding, training, and preparing your horse and it’s race strategy and tactics.
  • We have created a fun and immersive comic book story-line, fully illustrated by our artists.
  • There are literally hundreds of enhancements and new game play – you can read more below or watch our video.


*To learn more about our new game you can go to our section below entitled: "About the new version of our game"

Our goal is to bring our entire horse racing world to mobile so you can sneak a quick game in anywhere whilst you're pretending to pay attention to something else. In this day and age it’s important to keep on top of the henchmen and keep those antagonists under control. We felt that as a committed stable owner you would need access to your empire at all times, even when you were on the go.

So, the mobile version of our game is in the works.  You will be able to play it on your Android and Apple devices and eventually your PC as well.  We have decided to build this in “modules” and release components of the game, as they are ready.  You will see below what our plan is and a little preview of some of our prototypes.


*To learn more about our new game you can scroll down to our section below entitled: "About our Future Mobile Racing and Handicapping Games"

We need your help, because as with all good planning, sometimes you cannot plan for those curve balls. Some of our engineers are based out in the Ukraine, who as we know is in contention with a big neighboring country; this caused all kinds of upheaval we just didn't plan for.  Nobody puts a regional military conflict contingency in his or her game project plan!

But regardless of all that, we decided that rather than release a half-baked game on-budget, we would continue to our original plan and inject as much quality and features as we could; we asked our leadership and our team to defer pay and/or take pay cuts.  Our goal was to retain our entire team and if necessary help them avoid being sent out into a difficult economic and geopolitical environment. 

So we managed to blow through our estimates on the game and have used up all our pizza discount vouchers, we didn't win the state lottery as expected, and so we're out of cash!

We need your help to get our horse over the finish line, so please just get behind us and give us a big push!

*To learn more about our budget and team, please go to the respective sections below entitled: "Budget" and "Our Team"

 

We know that asking for money for a Facebook and Mobile game is a big "ask," so we are trying to give you as much as we can back, by releasing our games for free and offering lots of cool stuff.  This is kind of like you giving to us, and we give back to you; or paying forward.  Another way to think of it is that you are paying a discounted price for something you wanted anyway, and we're throwing in some extra gifts to say thank you for your help.  Here is the chart of perks you can get when you contribute:

In any case, with your help we can release games for free, and continue to produce world-class horse racing content. As an extra incentive we will give cool prizes to everyone who plays the game for us achieving each higher level of funding as well as offer really awesome prizes for those contributors who refer the most other people and money.

*To learn more about our our perks and contribution levels, please scroll down to the bottom section entitled: "Rewards"

In addition to trying to raise $150,000 to finish our game, we have established several stretch goals,that if we by chance raise more money, we will achieve with additional funds.  They include things like our full interactive racing, mobile games and a lot more.

Plus, in addition to the stretch goals above, our amazing artist, voice actors, and composers have offered to donate free perks for everyone if we meet the following campaign goals:

  • Funded! $300,000 – We will add a really awesome Las Vegas Downs to our new game free to everyone
  • Funded! $500,000 – We will add a really awesome star collection mini-game to our Blazing Silks High Stake Racing game
  • Funded! $750,000 – We will add a really awesome Medyan Racetrack from Dubai to our new game free to everyone
  • Funded! $1,000,000  – We will add this year’s Breeders’ Cup champions to all our games for breeding
  • Funded! $1,250,000 – We will add a “Paddock” pre-race view to all our games to help you size up the competition or to give a proper once over of the field before submitting your picks
  • Funded! $1,500,000 – If we reach this lofty goal we will install some cool player controlled features: pre-race paddock “dance” moves for your horse, post-race jockey celebrations, and of in-race photo taking to capture your highs and lows!
So everyone benefits by us reaching each successive level.

*To learn more about our our the Stretch Goals, please scroll down to the section entitled: "Stretch Goals"

The more awareness we create, the more money we will be able to raise, and we will be able to keep creating great racing games and keep our awesome community growing.

We really need for you to get all of your friends, colleagues, and neighbors to join in on our fun; so we are going to give away three awesome prizes to the top three supporters who bring in the most contributions using Indiegogo's sharing tools.  Therefore even if you can't afford to contribute a lot yourself, you can still win a great prize by recruiting other people to donate money through your own connections and fundraising campaign.

We don't know exactly what the prize will be, because we want it to be awesome and meaningful to our winner - and we haven't figured out what the pinnacle of awesome is yet!  But we do know one thing – the top prize will include tickets to next years Breeders’ Cup weekend.  Second and third prizes will most certainly be something like a super cool collectible or maybe a lead role in one of our future games, or who knows...something even better we have not yet thought of.  In any case it will be really cool and worth pursuing!

Please note - we cannot promise that pair of roller skates you potentially wanted for your 5th birthday though.

There will be a twenty-referral minimum for a prize and we will be measuring both the number of referral’s and the total amount contributed by your referrals when selecting our winner. Remember, if you can't contribute and want to go for this special prize be sure to create and Indiegogo account and use their tools!

At I-Race we are big fans of horse racing.  However, we are even bigger fans of racehorses and we are committed to increasing the awareness and love of our sport and most importantly the beautiful equine participants.  Additionally, we are committed to the humane and loving treatment of these equine athletes during their career and in their retirement.  As such we really admire the efforts of the Thoroughbred Retirement Foundation (TRF) and their affiliated companies. 

The TRF's mission is clear "To save Thoroughbred horses no longer able to compete on the racetrack from possible neglect, abuse and slaughter."  As explained on the TRF website, the sad truth is that a vast majority of the general public and even many racing fans are unaware of the sad fate that awaits thousands of Thoroughbreds each year. 

The reality is the training and racing community is only equipped financially to care and breed a small number of the horses bred each year for racing. The further reality is that horse meat is in high demand in many foreign countries and there are several slaughterhouses in the U.S., Canada and Mexico happy to create a supply.  It is a reality the TRF is determined to change and one we are hopeful we can help change as well.  

So we have decided that a percentage of every dollar raised will go directly to the TRF or one of it's affiliated companies.  You can learn more about the TRF and its efforts here.

Since our first beta game released our entire team has been blown away by the passion, interest, and support that so many of our players have expressed and given. Most importantly we are truly appreciative of the patience displayed and the thoughtful feedback given, as we "learned" how to make a better racing game. 

The journey to create our full Blazing Silks game began over a year ago with a customer survey that so many of you we're kind enough to provide your thorough, honest and provocative ideas. We have listened to your feedback and believe we are going to meet and exceed your expectations. We have stayed true to our cause, largely because we felt vested in you and our promise to make a better racing game than any that existed in the market.

Thanks for reading, and we hope you'll consider investing in the future of Blazing Silks and I-Race. With your help we can continue to deliver exciting and fun racing games for everyone.

The goal of the new game is to breed, race and train Breeders’ Cup Classic champion horses. This is accomplished by developing a championship caliber bloodline by progressing through the game, building a World class horse racing operation, training and racing your horses to the top of the game’s leader-boards and continuing to improve your horses generation after generation. 

The game has grown substantially in size, with over 20 beautiful and recognizable tracks from around the world, plus a compelling and immersive story driven single-player-game that will take months of regular game-play to complete.

Some of the highlights of the new game-play elements are:

Expanded Stable Management
We felt that our original stable was inadequate compared to the ambitions of our racing players.  We have therefore overhauled the old stables, mucked them out, hosed them down and constructed a brand new stable pristine management system. 

A New Mission System 

The new Blazing Silks mission system gives our players a set of compact, direct, and increasingly challenging goals to accomplish over the course of the game. They are purely optional; and you can play the game any way you like, but missions give rewards and should not overly tax your mouse finger.

Core Game Cycle

We have completely re-written our core game-play and replaced our "Challenges" into two separate, self-directed game-play elements: 1) a core management cycle of training, caring, feed, managing, and equipping your horses and 2) global racing challenges. 


Training Your Horses

Now you will have to build your own “Training Centers” and improve them through crafting, construction and sometimes invention.  You will need to make constant choices how to actively train your horse.  You must work harder for your success; luckily we have made the work entertaining.


Racing Challenges

Blazing Silks now features over 20 tracks from around the world that are unlocked as your career progresses and features both single-player and multi-player races. Each track has its own unique visual theme and provides beautiful vistas for you and your horses!


Pre-Race Setup

Both our single-player and multiplayer races have received significant interface enhancements to help you better equip your horse and jockey, prepare for a race, set your race tactics and importantly to understand the prospects of your horse entering a race and what went right or wrong during an actual live race. 


Coming Soon! Interactive Racing

Most exciting to our serious fans (who really want to “control” the action), coming soon to this version of the game will be the ability to race in single-player and some multi-player interactive races.  These races will have interactive elements - the "Urge" button, direction controls, and pacing your horse - that will allow players compete not only on their ability to train and prepare their horses, but also based on their own digital dexterity!

Breeding 

We have dramatically improved our breeding game-play.  In addition to added control of the look and ability of your fillies and colts, we now allow you to breed your own horses with horses owned by your friends and acquaintances. Also, the importance of breeding to success in the game has been expanded greatly, your bloodline will make your success, so breed wisely!

New User Interface

While the game will look and feel familiar, you will quickly see that we have completely overhauled the user interface and tutorial to make the game more accessible and fun to play, with gorgeous art throughout the game, and lots of nice buttons to press!

Achievements

We have created an entirely new achievement system, so in addition to earning lots of gold coins in this game, you can collect really cool achievement badges and earn extra status, as well as gauge your progression and proficiency against your friends and foes


Helping and Gifting

There are so many exciting elements to this new game it would take us a month just to list them here, so just like in the game where you can have your friends help and gift you needed items, we will use that month to ask you to help and send us a gift!


Comic book Story-line

Finally, we have introduced a multi-layered storyline, where you are the "hero" and need to help your sister and father return the family racing business to the pinnacle of racing. You will be challenged along the way by your families arch-nemesis and a host of other antagonists getting in your way at every opportunity.

Our artists have created some beautiful comic panels for you to enjoy throughout the game, can you spot the antagonist, henchman and evil arch nemesis in the panels below? Don't worry there will be plenty of opportunity to get to know these characters and the true extent of their in-game conniving evilness as you play.


Before we launch our full game, we plan to launch three unique mobile horse racing games, each one with its own set of skills to master. Some of you players revel in the chance to be in the saddle and steering your horse to victory, if so then Peer-to-Peer racing game will be for you. It's kind of a "Mario Cart" but with horses and other vital trademark infringement avoiding differences. Actually it’s more serious and realistic than Mario Cart could ever be, (we have not yet seen a plumber in a cart in red dungarees on the road, but then the world is a big place, so perhaps one day).

Perhaps you relish the owning and training gameplay of our Facebook game and would like to try your hand at our “Owners Club”.  Or perhaps you feel that your skills lie in picking a winner, and the wagering of in-game gold coins is your calling, in which case you will want to try our for-fun wagering game “ Blazing Silks – Stake your Claim” (working title).

Peer-to-Peer Racing

Here is a short video of our P2P racing prototype. Please do not ask why we have a race venue called hot chocolate, these things happened during prototypes.. Our player jumps in and expertly weaves through the pack, before using boost to get ahead and completely thrash our other players in the match! What fun!

You'll be able to race at any of our tracks, in your chosen racing silks and horse, and choose from a variety of different camera perspectives - although we all like jockey cam the best! With up to 10 players at once from around the world you could be racing to win or at least disrupt your friend’s hehe... Steward!!

Owners Club

Well if the life of a virtual jockey isn't for you, maybe you'd be better at the helm of your own farm. Owners club continues where Blazing Silks leaves off with you expertly managing your way to further success and riches in a simplified mobile game environment. You can still race at your favorite tracks and enjoy looking after your horses to win game currency and rewards.

For-fun Wagering

And you can try your hand at virtual wagering, use your skills to expertly handicap the race and try to win a fortune in gold coins. Of course if you lose your virtual shirt you can always go and do a bit of virtual jockey work on our P2P game or help out at the Owners Club to earn some more coins.

We don't want to let "the horse out of the barn" too early on this one but we have some very cool Game designs that will blend some of the most popular casual gameplay with our exciting 3-D horseracing.  You'll have to excuse our vagueness about these titles, but we want to keep our "cards close to our vest" at this time.  We promise you'll be excited by these fun and entertaining Games.


The Base Budget is $150,000 to launch “Blazing Silks – High Stakes Racing” game on Facebook.  Below is how that money is utilized:



  • 30% - Graphics, Design and Music - 

    • We have some amazing artists on our team and you are going to love the look, the characters and the music in our game.  They have done a fantastic job, and created a stunning and massive world for our. Our 3D horse racing assets alone exceed 40Gb, and the massive amount of effort we spent creating the new tracks is evident in every race you run. 

  •  35% - Programming - our engineers are seasoned industry professionals, dedicated to creative coding. Code is written for the servers that sit in the back doing the number crunching, the web clients that you play on, and the 3D system that delivers you the racing.  In this massive game these guys have done a great job bringing it all together.
  • 10% - Quality Assurance  - No game leaves the stable without going through rigorous QA. What this means is our QA team literally play the game from start to finish many, many times; covering the full breadth and depth of gameplay, playing with different spending and play strategies, all the while collecting bugs to fix, and recommendations on balance. It is a huge task with a game of this size.  
  • 10% - Administrative  - We really don’t have an admin team – Marcus, Jonathan and Alex really deal with everything an administrative team would do at most companies, but we do have administrative overhead like office expenses, travel, supplies, equipment etc.
  • 10% - Crowdfunding Cost - Ironic that asking for money costs money, gone are the days of trading a couple of goats for some software, now we must (happily) pay Indiegogo for this campaign and manage the fulfillment of all the really cool perks listed below.  All out of a budget which is already blown.
  • 5% - Other / TRF - And finally no budget is complete without that contingency and sundry costs or in this case our donation to TRF (N.B. This does not include natural disasters, conflicts, rebellions or invasion from another world). "Pizzas don't grow on trees" as one programmer expressed his need for a regular salary.

So who are the fifteen full-time members of I-Race, and what do they do?

  • Andrew - Design Lead
  • Yuri - Designer
  • Maxsimus  - 3D Artist
  • Oksana - Lead Artist
  • Daria - Artist
  • Serge - GUI / Flash Programmer
  • Vlad - GUI / Flash Programmer
  • Slav - GUI / Flash Programmer
  • Anton - Database and PHP Programming
  • Geno - Database and PHP Programming
  • Axel - Network Engineer and Game Tester / Customer Service Rep
  • Alan - Network Engineer and Game Tester
  • Alex - Team Manager
  • Marcus  - Head of Development and 3D programming Monkey
  • Jonathan - CEO / Producer / Administrative Assistant/ Bookkeeper/ Customer Service Rep
In addition to the fifteen core team members, your money will help pay our amazing friends and contractors:
  • Dennis - 3D Artist and Animator
  • Brian - Graphical Designer
  • Venable  - Our attorney
  • Valeriy - Concept and Character Artist
  • The Code-it Team - Game Testing and external QA
In addition to the above, we partner with great companies to deliver our game and provide the best service we can to you as well.  Some of the closest ones are Mixpanel, Unity, and Exit Games.
We would like to keep Spina Technologies and our Blazing Silks games growing as long as possible; so here is what we are planning to do if we manage to exceed our initial goal to keep your horses battling it out on the track:

If we managed to raise $300 thousand in total we will release interactive racing as a new form of in-game racing for everyone leveraging our ambitions in the mobile arena, you will be able to take jockey control in the game if that is your thing.

"You're mine Contagious Dancer!... Now I am in control! ..This time there is no escape... wait... waaaaait... noooo... Next time Contagious Dancer.. next time there will be no escape..."

If we manage to raise $500,000 we will release the "mini" mobile game called "Blazing Silks - High Stakes Edition" that will enable you to race in single player and multiplayer races, as well as participate in interactive racing contest while you're on the move with your IOS or Android phone or tablet.
\
"Ah Contagious Dancer... we meet again... I have been waiting...darn it.. I'm last again!!... "


If we manage to raise $750,000 we will release a casual mobile game for your IOS or Android phone or tablet.  The prototype for this game has already been built, but we are keeping the concept in "stealth" mode until we are closer to release.
As an added bonus Contagious Dancer  will also be banned from playing this game. (Hope this gets through the campaign edit- Illustrious Mule Owner)


If we manage to raise $1,000,000 we will release the full version of Blazing Silks on mobile for your IOS or Android phone or tablet, and for a limited period of time it will be free to download for everyone. This game will include all the single player and multi-player gameplay in an easy to access mobile format.


If we manage to raise $1,250,000 we will release an expansion pack and standalone mobile application that let's you pick the winners of our multi-player races and participate in virtual goods and handicapping contests.  This will be a very fun, as casual or complex "as you want it" horse race "Pick-em" game.




If we manage to raise $1,500,000 we will release super-high-quality-graphical version of our full Blazing Silks game meant to be played either on your home computer's browser or as a stand-alone application downloaded on Steam.  

Anything beyond this will be invested in the marketing or increasing the quality and scope of these game, or related expansion packs and mini-games.

So if you are wondering what goodies you get for helping us finish our games - here they are: (we probably should have told you this first!)

In game currency is a fabulous thing – it allows you to buy fantastic equipment for your horse and jockeys, it will help you grow your racing empire faster, it also is useful when you run out of critical things like energy, spirit, and food! It's made of real virtual gold.

We are making several really cool mobile games: a peer-to-peer interactive racing game, a for-fun handicapping and wagering game, a full version of Blazing Silks on mobile, and a top-secret casual horse racing themed game. We are offering free versions 1, 2, or all of these games based on which “Perk” level you choose.

Our artists usually get all the acclaim, but our game composer is truly the prodigy of our team.  You may only hear glimpses of our soundtrack in the background of our game, but why not make the full versions of these songs the soundtrack of your life instead of that dismal Mahler symphony you keep listening to, no offense but it is really depressing...

Don’t tell our artists, but we have taken their best work and created a beautiful digital book showing the creative process unfolding and giving you more than a glimpse into the artistic development of our in-game characters and horses.

Everyone wants one.  Until now – nobody could have one.  Get your very own white horse to race and breed with.  In fact create as many white horses as you want.  It will turn every head in the game and leave them wondering – how do I get one?  Well they can’t unless they buy the right tiers in our Indiegogo campaign!

Don’t assume because you start our current game by breeding with a Breeders’ Cup Legend, that in our new game you get to do the same.  In the new game, you will need to be well on your way to greatness before you get even a glimpse of these horses and then you are going to need a good portion of Fort Knox to cover the stud fees.  But if you buy a tier with this perk included you will get a champion horse in your stable from the start to breed with…. oh think of the possibilities!!

If we had a dollar for every time someone phoned us up and asked us for a “Blazing Silks Pint Glass”…well, let’s just say we still would need to run this Indiegogo campaign. But we know our fans like a little hops to make their horses run faster.  Get your own set of 4 Pint Glasses by choosing the right beer tier.

Get yourself a one-of-a-kind Blazing Silks bobble head horse for your vehicle or wobbly item to project your interest in the noble sport of horse racing. Yes, it can be one of your horses and will have your horses name inscribed on the base.  Please note however your bobble head horse is a gelding so it is a waste of time to try to breed them with other bobble headed horses to produce bobble head fillies and colts. (N.B. Bobble head horse food must be purchased separately.)

Our graphic designers and artists can sometimes be persuaded to sign their work and this is an exclusive chance to get a unique signed piece of artwork to decorate your own horse racing shrine with. Grab one of these now as they are limited editions, and only available because we promised our artists pizza and shelter for making them.

This gets you a back stage pass to our closed Beta of the new game, be one of the first to learn the ropes and get a head start on everyone prior to the game being released. We cannot transfer your earnings in the Beta game to the live game, but you will have something much more valuable - experience and knowledge, our new game is quite different to the original Blazing Silks and there is a lot to learn for a new player!

Ever wanted to make your mark on gaming history, and be directly involved in what is set to be the world's premiere online racing experience on Facebook and mobile? This perk offers you just that by giving you the chance to be involved in the design phase of our next three mobile games, providing exclusive behind-the-scenes access to the screens and gameplay as they are produced, giving your input to the team and acknowledged on the game credits.  You will get to personally interact with and thought partner with Jonathan, Marcus and our design team.

This perk gets you a brand new exclusive set of Blazing Silks racing silks sent to you, but of course we cannot guarantee that they will fit you!  They will be your “stables” silks and have your farm name on them!

Digital immortality awaits you as our skilled artists will convert your approved* provided photograph into an in-game cartoon star!  Your digital self will help thousands of players play the game and you can choose whether you want to be a hired Jockey, Trainer, or farm Staff in our games

We have the best seats at the best race of the year…literally! Before they were even open to the public, our friends at the Breeders’ Cup gave us first choice of seats at Keeneland (Kentucky) for this year’s Championship Weekend.  We have five pairs of tickets we are offering to you.  If you want to look them up, they are Section K, Rows B or C!  There literally is no better view in the Reserved Grandstands.  From here you have a direct view of the final stretch, the finish line and the winners circle.  You will be seated among movie stars, a group of Blazing Silks fans, and who knows you might end up sitting between our CEO and one the BC’s Ambassadors like Bobby Flay or Kate Upton! (http://www.breederscup.com/experience/celebrities )

For each donation at this tier we will give you a pair of reserved grandstand seats for both weekend races.  We will also provide you access to special clubs, events, and give you a $100 wagering voucher.

You don't have a lot of time to secure these so better move quickly, the Breeders' Cup is just around the corner, if you want to go - gettem!

If you want to attend the 2016 Breeders’ Cup at Santa Anita in style, then this is the way to go.  This “Experience” package includes complimentary tickets for 2 persons to the 2016 Breeders' Cup Championships at Santa Anita in Pasadena, CA.  We will provide hotel accommodations, limousine transport from your hotel to the event, VIP Access to cool party's, track clubs. We will also provide a private tour of backside where you can meet the trainers and jockeys competing in the event.  We will also provide dining, drink and wagering vouchers to make sure that you are in tip-top shape for all the festivities.  While the tickets won’t be available to us until January, just like this year, we will be able to get some of the best seats in the house.  So you will get to rub elbows with Hollywood’s finest and maybe event the former governor of Cal-e-forn-e-a!



Two dollars gets you our gratitude for supporting I-Race and helping make Blazing Silks a reality. You’ll also get $5 worth of in-game currency!

Five bucks gets you even more gratitude for helping make Blazing Silks a reality. Plus you get $10 worth of in-game currency – and that’s not too shabby!

At this tier the goods start flowing!  For you $15 you get not only our gratitude, $30 worth of in-game currency, but you also get a free version of our next Blazing Silks mobile game.

With a little bit bigger gift you can get our gratitude, $50 of in-game currency, and free versions of the next two Blazing Silks mobile games as well as our game soundtrack.

For 55 bucks you can get a ton of gratitude, $110 of in-game currency, and free versions of all our Blazing Silks mobile games, our game soundtrack, and our digital art book!

For 75 bucks you can get a ton of gratitude, $150 of in-game currency, free versions of all our Blazing Silks mobile games, our game soundtrack, our digital art book and an in-game white horse.

For just 100 dollars you get a ton of gratitude, $200 of in-game currency, free versions of all our Blazing Silks mobile games, our game soundtrack, our digital art book, an in-game white horse, and an in-game Breeders’ Cup Classic champion horse to breed with.

For just $145 you get a ton of gratitude, $300 of in-game currency, free versions of all our Blazing Silks mobile games, our game soundtrack, our digital art book, an in-game white horse, an in-game Breeders’ Cup Classic champion horse to breed with, and a beautiful set of 4 Blazing Silks beer steins.

For just $295 you get a ton of gratitude, $300 of in-game currency, free versions of all our Blazing Silks mobile games, our game soundtrack, our digital art book, an in-game white horse, an in-game Breeders’ Cup Classic champion horse to breed with, and a one of kind Bobble Head Blazing Silks horse that is a likeness of your horse and has your horses name on the name plate.

For just $395 you get a ton of gratitude, $300 of in-game currency, free versions of all our Blazing Silks mobile games, our game soundtrack, our digital art book, an in-game white horse, an in-game Breeders’ Cup Classic champion horse to breed with, and a limited edition lithograph from our game signed by the artist.

For $495 you get all "Patron" level perks and you get to be part of our closed “Beta” test.  Plus, you will get a "Patron Saint" title in the “Contributors Credits” of our new Blazing Silks games.

For $1,495 you get all "Patron" level perks, you get to be part of our closed “Beta” test, as well as be a Design Consultant on our mobile games.  Plus you will get an "Angel" title in the “Contributors Credits” of our new Blazing Silks games.

For $2,295 you get all "Patron" level perks, you get to be part of our closed “Beta” test, as well as be a Design Consultant on our mobile games, and you will get Racing Silks of your own stable’s design.  Plus you will get an "Archangel" title in the “Contributors Credits” of our new Blazing Silks games.

For $4,495 you get all "Patron" level perks, you get to be part of our closed “Beta” test, as well as be a Design Consultant on our mobile games, you will get Racing Silks of your own stable’s design, and you get your likeness as a character in our future Blazing Silks games.  Plus you will get a "Guardian Angel" title in the “Contributors Credits” of our new Blazing Silks games.


For $7,495 you get "Guardian Angel" level perks plus a pair of 2015 Breeders' Cup Championship weekend tickets (which includes complimentary VIP grandstand tickets for two persons for racing on Friday and Saturday at Keeneland in Lexington Kentucky, access to track clubs, dining, drink and wagering vouchers - airfare and hotels NOT included), plus a "Champion" title in the “Contributors Credits” of our new Blazing Silks games.

For $19,995 you get "Guardian Angel” level perks plus a "2016 Breeders' Cup Championships Experience Package" (Includes complimentary tickets for 2 persons to the 2016 Breeders' Cup Championships at Santa Anita in Pasadena, CA) hotel accommodations, Airfare (within the continental USA), VIP Access to party's, track clubs, tour of backside and meeting trainer and jockey competing in the event, dining and wagering vouchers), plus a "Legend" title in the “Contributors Credits” of our new Blazing Silks games.
story_txt:
I-Race Games needs additional
funds to complete our new Blazing Silks Facebook game "Blazing Silks -
High Stakes Racing" and to create related Blazing Silks mobile games.  Are you ready for the new Blazing
Silks game? I know we are!If this is your first time on Indiegogo, then let us explain that this is a "crowdfunding" campaign where a lot of people give a little bit of money and it adds up to a lot of money.  So we are just asking that people give a few dollars. So, for example, if all of our active customer's gave just  $5 we would have enough money to get this game done! And with the perks below you would get $20 of in-game currency $10 in this game and $10 in the next game...it is easy money for our players!!  If you just want to give $5 click here.  If you want to give $25 click here.  If you want to give $100 click here.  To see more perks look on the left side of the screen and scroll down.If you are interested in giving more we have all kinds of cool perks and prizes (including tickets to this years Breeders' Cup) for those who can afford more.  Plus, if you want to just leverage your network of friends - we have a contest where the people who refer the most friends and money will get cool prizes - the Grand Prize being tickets to next years Breeders Cup.  
We have been working for over a year to create our new game; we
took all of our learning, mounds of your feedback and game improvement ideas,
and produced this completely new version of "Blazing Silks” called “High
Stakes Racing”.  We are very proud of this new game and it has improved
game-play in the areas you have come to love as well as many exciting new
elements that have been encouraged by our fan-base. 


The goal of this new game is to build the greatest horse racing
breeding and racing empire in our virtual world. It focuses on building a
bloodline over many generations to breed one or more ultimate Breeders’ Cup
Champions.

This game will have these key features, plus a whole lot more:


New core game “cycle” that
includes crafting and resource management. 
You can care, feed, train, and equip your horses and jockeys.  You can staff and maintain your farm.


Expanded racing challenges – with
over twenty gorgeous tracks and hundreds and hundreds of racing challenges  - the single player campaign will take months
to finish. 


Interactive Racing – we are going
to let you take the reins and see your favorite Breeders’ Cup tracks from the
best seat in the house.


Everything has been improved and made
more comprehensive: breeding, training, and preparing your horse and it’s race
strategy and tactics.


We have created a fun and immersive comic book
story-line, fully illustrated by our artists.

There are literally hundreds of enhancements and new game play – you can
read more below or watch our video.



*To learn more about our new game you
can go to our section below entitled: "About the new version of our game"

Our goal is to bring our entire
horse racing world to mobile so you can sneak a quick game in anywhere whilst
you're pretending to pay attention to something else. In this day and age it’s
important to keep on top of the henchmen and keep those antagonists under
control. We felt that as a committed stable owner you would need access to your
empire at all times, even when you were on the go.
So, the mobile version of our
game is in the works.  You will be able to play it on your Android and
Apple devices and eventually your PC as well. 
We have decided to build this in “modules” and release components of the
game, as they are ready.  You will see below what our plan is and a little
preview of some of our prototypes.

*To learn more about our new game you can scroll down to our section below entitled: "About our Future Mobile Racing and Handicapping Games"
We need your help, because as with all good planning, sometimes you cannot plan for those curve balls. Some of our engineers are based out in the Ukraine, who as we know is in contention with a big neighboring country; this caused all kinds of upheaval we just didn't plan for.  Nobody puts a regional military conflict contingency in his or her game project plan!But regardless of all that, we decided that rather than release a half-baked game on-budget, we would continue to our original plan and inject as much quality and features as we could; we asked our leadership and our team to defer pay and/or take pay cuts.  Our goal was to retain our entire team and if necessary help them avoid being sent out into a difficult economic and geopolitical environment. So we managed to blow through our estimates on the game and have used up all our pizza discount vouchers, we didn't win the state lottery as expected, and so we're out of cash!We need your help to get our horse over the finish line, so please just get behind us and give us a big push!
*To learn more about our budget and team, please go to the respective sections below entitled: "Budget" and "Our Team" 
We know that asking for money for
a Facebook and Mobile game is a big "ask," so we are trying to give
you as much as we can back, by releasing our games for free and offering
lots of cool stuff.  This is kind of like you giving to us, and we give
back to you; or paying forward.  Another way to think of it is that you
are paying a discounted price for something you wanted anyway, and we're
throwing in some extra gifts to say thank you for your help.  Here is the
chart of perks you can get when you contribute:

In any case, with your help we
can release games for free, and continue to produce world-class horse racing
content. As an extra incentive we will give cool prizes to everyone who
plays the game for us achieving each higher level of funding as well as offer
really awesome prizes for those contributors who refer the most other people
and money.
*To learn more about our our perks and contribution levels, please scroll down to the bottom section entitled: "Rewards"
In addition to trying to raise
$150,000 to finish our game, we have established several stretch goals,that if
we by chance raise more money, we will achieve with additional funds.  They include things like our full interactive
racing, mobile games and a lot more.

Plus, in addition to the stretch
goals above, our amazing artist, voice actors, and composers have offered to
donate free perks for everyone if we meet the following campaign goals:


Funded! $300,000 – We will
add a really awesome Las Vegas Downs to our new game free to everyone


Funded! $500,000 – We will
add a really awesome star collection mini-game to our Blazing Silks High Stake
Racing game


Funded! $750,000 – We will
add a really awesome Medyan Racetrack from Dubai to our new game free to everyone


Funded! $1,000,000  – We
will add this year’s Breeders’ Cup champions to all our games for breeding


Funded! $1,250,000 – We will
add a “Paddock” pre-race view to all our games to help you size up the
competition or to give a proper once over of the field before submitting your
picks


Funded! $1,500,000 – If we
reach this lofty goal we will install some cool player controlled features:
pre-race paddock “dance” moves for your horse, post-race jockey celebrations,
and of in-race photo taking to capture your highs and lows!












So everyone benefits by us reaching each successive level.

*To learn more about our our the Stretch Goals, please scroll down to the section entitled: "Stretch Goals"


The more awareness we create, the
more money we will be able to raise, and we will be able to keep creating great
racing games and keep our awesome community growing.
We really need for you to get all
of your friends, colleagues, and neighbors to join in on our fun; so we are
going to give away three awesome prizes to the top three supporters who bring
in the most contributions using Indiegogo's sharing tools.  Therefore even
if you can't afford to contribute a lot yourself, you can still win a great
prize by recruiting other people to donate money through your own connections
and fundraising campaign.
We don't know exactly what the
prize will be, because we want it to be awesome and meaningful to our winner -
and we haven't figured out what the pinnacle of awesome is yet!  But we do
know one thing – the top prize will include tickets to next years
Breeders’ Cup weekend.  Second and third prizes will most certainly be something
like a super cool collectible or maybe a lead role in one of our future games,
or who knows...something even better we have not yet thought of.  In any
case it will be really cool and worth pursuing!
Please note - we cannot promise
that pair of roller skates you potentially wanted for your 5th birthday though.
There will be a twenty-referral minimum for a prize and we will be
measuring both the number of referral’s and the total amount contributed by
your referrals when selecting our winner. Remember, if you can't contribute and
want to go for this special prize be sure to create and Indiegogo account and
use their tools!




At I-Race we are big fans of horse racing.  However, we are even bigger fans of racehorses and we are committed to increasing the awareness and love of our sport and most importantly the beautiful equine participants.  Additionally, we are committed to the humane and loving treatment of these equine athletes during their career and in their retirement.  As such we really admire the efforts of the Thoroughbred Retirement Foundation (TRF) and their affiliated companies. 
The TRF's mission is clear "To save Thoroughbred horses no longer able to compete on the racetrack from possible neglect, abuse and slaughter."  As explained on the TRF website, the sad truth is that a vast majority of the general public and even many racing fans are unaware of the sad fate that awaits thousands of Thoroughbreds each year. 
The reality is the training and racing community is only equipped financially to care and breed a small number of the horses bred each year for racing. The further reality is that horse meat is in high demand in many foreign countries and there are several slaughterhouses in the U.S., Canada and Mexico happy to create a supply.  It is a reality the TRF is determined to change and one we are hopeful we can help change as well.  
So we have decided that a percentage of every dollar raised will go directly to the TRF or one of it's affiliated companies.  You can learn more about the TRF and its efforts here.



Since our first beta game released our entire team has been blown away by the passion, interest, and support that so many of our players have expressed and given. Most importantly we are truly appreciative of the patience displayed and the thoughtful feedback given, as we "learned" how to make a better racing game. 
The journey to create our full Blazing Silks game began over a year ago with a customer survey that so many of you we're kind enough to provide your thorough, honest and provocative ideas. We have listened to your feedback and believe we are going to meet and exceed your expectations. We have stayed true to our cause, largely because we felt vested in you and our promise to make a better racing game than any that existed in the market.Thanks for reading, and we hope you'll consider investing in the future of Blazing Silks and I-Race. With your help we can continue to deliver exciting and fun racing games for everyone.






The goal of the new game is to
breed, race and train Breeders’ Cup Classic champion horses. This is
accomplished by developing a championship caliber bloodline by progressing
through the game, building a World class horse racing operation, training and
racing your horses to the top of the game’s leader-boards and continuing to
improve your horses generation after generation. 
The game has grown substantially
in size, with over 20 beautiful and recognizable tracks from around the world,
plus a compelling and immersive story driven single-player-game that will take
months of regular game-play to complete. 
Some of the highlights of the new
game-play elements are:


Expanded Stable ManagementWe felt that our original stable was
inadequate compared to the ambitions of our racing players.  We have therefore overhauled the old stables,
mucked them out, hosed them down and constructed a brand new stable
pristine management system. 



A New Mission System 

The new Blazing Silks mission
system gives our players a set of compact, direct, and increasingly challenging
goals to accomplish over the course of the game. They are purely
optional; and you can play the game any way you like, but
missions give rewards and should not overly tax your mouse finger.




Core Game Cycle

We have completely re-written our
core game-play and replaced our "Challenges" into two separate,
self-directed game-play elements: 1) a core management cycle of training,
caring, feed, managing, and equipping your horses and 2) global racing
challenges. 







Training Your Horses


Now you will have to build
your own “Training Centers” and improve them through crafting,
construction and sometimes invention. 
You will need to make constant choices how to actively train your
horse.  You must work harder for your
success; luckily we have made the work entertaining.







Racing Challenges
Blazing Silks
now features over 20 tracks from around the world that are unlocked as your
career progresses and features both single-player and multi-player races. Each
track has its own unique visual theme and provides beautiful vistas for you and
your horses!

Pre-Race Setup
Both our single-player and
multiplayer races have received significant interface enhancements to help
you better equip your horse and jockey, prepare for a race, set your race
tactics and importantly to understand the prospects of your horse entering a
race and what went right or wrong during an actual live race. 




Coming Soon! Interactive Racing
Most exciting to our serious fans
(who really want to “control” the action), coming soon to this version of the
game will be the ability to race in single-player and some multi-player interactive
races.  These races will have interactive
elements - the "Urge" button, direction controls, and pacing your
horse - that will allow players compete not only on their ability to train and
prepare their horses, but also based on their own digital dexterity!



Breeding 
We have dramatically improved
our breeding game-play.  In addition to
added control of the look and ability of your fillies and colts, we now allow you
to breed your own horses with horses owned by your friends
and acquaintances. Also, the importance of breeding to success in
the game has been expanded greatly, your bloodline will make your success, so breed
wisely!






New User Interface
While the game will look and feel
familiar, you will quickly see that we have completely overhauled the user
interface and tutorial to make the game more accessible and fun to play, with
gorgeous art throughout the game, and lots of nice buttons to press!


Achievements
We have created an entirely
new achievement system, so in addition to earning lots of gold coins in this
game, you can collect really cool achievement badges and earn extra status, as
well as gauge your progression and proficiency against your friends and foes






Helping and Gifting
There are so many exciting
elements to this new game it would take us a month just to list them here, so
just like in the game where you can have your friends help and gift you needed
items, we will use that month to ask you to help and send us a gift!

Comic book Story-line


Finally, we have introduced
a multi-layered storyline, where you are the "hero" and need to help
your sister and father return the family racing business to the pinnacle of
racing. You will be challenged along the way by your families arch-nemesis and
a host of other antagonists getting in your way at every opportunity. 
Our artists
have created some beautiful comic panels for you to enjoy throughout the game,
can you spot the antagonist, henchman and evil arch nemesis in the panels
below? Don't worry there will be plenty of opportunity to get to know these
characters and the true extent of their in-game conniving evilness as you play.

















Before we launch our full game, we
plan to launch three unique mobile horse racing games, each one with its own
set of skills to master. Some of you players revel in the chance to be in the
saddle and steering your horse to victory, if so then Peer-to-Peer racing game
will be for you. It's kind of a "Mario Cart" but with horses and
other vital trademark infringement avoiding differences. Actually it’s more
serious and realistic than Mario Cart could ever be, (we have not yet seen a
plumber in a cart in red dungarees on the road, but then the world is a big place, so perhaps one day).
Perhaps you relish the owning and
training gameplay of our Facebook game and would like to try your hand at our “Owners
Club”.  Or perhaps you feel that your
skills lie in picking a winner, and the wagering of in-game gold coins is your
calling, in which case you will want to try our for-fun wagering game “ Blazing
Silks – Stake your Claim” (working title).
Peer-to-Peer Racing





Here is a short video of our P2P
racing prototype. Please do not ask why we have a race venue called hot
chocolate, these things happened during prototypes.. Our player jumps in and expertly weaves through the pack,
before using boost to get ahead and completely thrash our other players in
the match! What fun! 
You'll be able to race at any of
our tracks, in your chosen racing silks and horse, and choose from a
variety of different camera perspectives - although we all like jockey cam the
best! With up to 10 players at once from around the world you could be
racing to win or at least disrupt your friend’s hehe... Steward!!



Owners Club





Well if the life of a virtual
jockey isn't for you, maybe you'd be better at the helm of your own farm.
Owners club continues where Blazing Silks leaves off with you expertly managing
your way to further success and riches in a simplified mobile game environment.
You can still race at your favorite tracks and enjoy looking after your horses
to win game currency and rewards.



For-fun Wagering





And you can try your hand at
virtual wagering, use your skills to expertly handicap the race and try to win a
fortune in gold coins. Of course if you lose your virtual shirt you can always
go and do a bit of virtual jockey work on our P2P game or help out at the
Owners Club to earn some more coins.








We don't want to let "the
horse out of the barn" too early on this one but we have some very cool
Game designs that will blend some of the most popular casual gameplay with our
exciting 3-D horseracing.  You'll have to excuse our vagueness about these
titles, but we want to keep our "cards close to our vest" at this
time.  We promise you'll be excited by these fun and entertaining Games.





The Base Budget is $150,000 to
launch “Blazing Silks – High Stakes Racing” game on Facebook.  Below is how that money is utilized:






30% - Graphics, Design and Music - 

We have some amazing artists on
our team and you are going to love the look, the characters and the music in
our game.  They have done a fantastic
job, and created a stunning and massive world for our. Our 3D horse racing
assets alone exceed 40Gb, and the massive amount of effort we spent creating
the new tracks is evident in every race you run. 


 35% - Programming - 
our engineers are seasoned
industry professionals, dedicated to creative coding. Code is written for the
servers that sit in the back doing the number crunching, the web clients that
you play on, and the 3D system that delivers you the racing.  In this massive game these guys have done a
great job bringing it all together.


10% - Quality Assurance  - 
No game leaves the stable
without going through rigorous QA. What this means is our QA team literally
play the game from start to finish many, many times; covering the full breadth
and depth of gameplay, playing with different spending and play strategies, all
the while collecting bugs to fix, and recommendations on balance. It is a huge
task with a game of this size.  


10% - Administrative  - 
We really don’t have an
admin team – Marcus, Jonathan and Alex really deal with everything an
administrative team would do at most companies, but we do have administrative
overhead like office expenses, travel, supplies, equipment etc.


10% - Crowdfunding Cost - Ironic that asking for money
costs money, gone are the days of trading a couple of goats for some software,
now we must (happily) pay Indiegogo for this campaign and manage the fulfillment
of all the really cool perks listed below. 
All out of a budget which is already blown.


5% - Other / TRF - 
And finally no budget is
complete without that contingency and sundry costs or in this case our donation
to TRF (N.B. This does not include natural disasters, conflicts, rebellions or
invasion from another world). "Pizzas don't grow on trees" as one programmer expressed his need for a regular salary.



So who are the fifteen full-time members of I-Race, and what do they do?



Andrew - Design Lead

Yuri - Designer

Maxsimus  - 3D Artist

Oksana - Lead Artist

Daria - Artist


Serge - GUI / Flash Programmer

Vlad - GUI / Flash Programmer

Slav - GUI / Flash Programmer

Anton - Database and PHP Programming

Geno - Database and PHP Programming

Axel - Network Engineer and Game Tester / Customer Service Rep

Alan - Network Engineer and Game Tester

Alex - Team Manager


Marcus  - Head of Development and 3D programming Monkey

Jonathan - CEO / Producer / Administrative Assistant/ Bookkeeper/ Customer Service Rep

In addition to the fifteen core team members, your money will help pay our amazing friends and contractors:


Dennis - 3D Artist and Animator

Brian - Graphical Designer


Venable  - Our attorney

Valeriy - Concept and Character Artist

The Code-it Team - Game Testing and external QA

In addition to the above, we partner with great companies to deliver our game and provide the best service we can to you as well.  Some of the closest ones are Mixpanel, Unity, and Exit Games.



We would like to keep Spina Technologies and our Blazing Silks games growing as long as possible; so here is what we are planning to do if we manage to exceed our initial goal to keep your horses battling it out on the track:

If we managed to raise $300 thousand in total we will release interactive racing as a new form of in-game racing for everyone leveraging our ambitions in the mobile arena, you will be able to take jockey control in the game if that is your thing.



"You're mine Contagious Dancer!... Now I am in control! ..This time there is no escape... wait... waaaaait... noooo... Next time Contagious Dancer.. next time there will be no escape..."



If we manage to raise $500,000 we will release the "mini" mobile game called "Blazing Silks - High Stakes Edition" that will enable you to race in single player and multiplayer races, as well as participate in interactive racing contest while you're on the move with your IOS or Android phone or tablet.

\"Ah Contagious Dancer... we meet again... I have been waiting...darn it.. I'm last again!!... "
If we manage to raise $750,000 we will release a casual mobile game for your IOS or Android phone or tablet.  The prototype for this game has already been built, but we are keeping the concept in "stealth" mode until we are closer to release.As an added bonus Contagious Dancer  will also be banned from playing this game. (Hope this gets through the campaign edit- Illustrious Mule Owner)
If we manage to raise $1,000,000 we will release the full version of Blazing Silks on mobile for your IOS or Android phone or tablet, and for a limited period of time it will be free to download for everyone. This game will include all the single player and multi-player gameplay in an easy to access mobile format. 


If we manage to raise $1,250,000 we will release an expansion pack and standalone mobile application that let's you pick the winners of our multi-player races and participate in virtual goods and handicapping contests.  This will be a very fun, as casual or complex "as you want it" horse race "Pick-em" game.

If we manage to raise $1,500,000 we will release super-high-quality-graphical version of our full Blazing Silks game meant to be played either on your home computer's browser or as a stand-alone application downloaded on Steam.  Anything beyond this will be invested in the marketing or increasing the quality and scope of these game, or related expansion packs and mini-games. 


So if you are wondering what goodies you get for helping us finish our games - here they are: (we probably should have told you this first!)


In game currency is a fabulous thing – it allows you to buy fantastic equipment for your horse and jockeys, it will help you grow your racing empire faster, it also is useful when you run out of critical things like energy, spirit, and food! It's made of real virtual gold.

We are making several really cool mobile games: a peer-to-peer interactive racing game, a for-fun handicapping and wagering game, a full version of Blazing Silks on mobile, and a top-secret casual horse racing themed game. We are offering free versions 1, 2, or all of these games based on which “Perk” level you choose.

Our artists usually get all the acclaim, but our game composer is truly the prodigy of our team.  You may only hear glimpses of our soundtrack in the background of our game, but why not make the full versions of these songs the soundtrack of your life instead of that dismal Mahler symphony you keep listening to, no offense but it is really depressing...

Don’t tell our artists, but we have taken their best work and created a beautiful digital book showing the creative process unfolding and giving you more than a glimpse into the artistic development of our in-game characters and horses.

Everyone wants one.  Until now – nobody could have one.  Get your very own white horse to race and breed with.  In fact create as many white horses as you want.  It will turn every head in the game and leave them wondering – how do I get one?  Well they can’t unless they buy the right tiers in our Indiegogo campaign!


Don’t assume because you start
our current game by breeding with a Breeders’ Cup Legend, that in our new game
you get to do the same.  In the new game, you will need to be well on your
way to greatness before you get even a glimpse of these horses and then you are
going to need a good portion of Fort Knox to cover the stud fees.  But if
you buy a tier with this perk included you will get a champion horse in your
stable from the start to breed with…. oh think of the possibilities!!

If we had a dollar for every time someone phoned us up and asked us for a “Blazing Silks Pint Glass”…well, let’s just say we still would need to run this Indiegogo campaign. But we know our fans like a little hops to make their horses run faster.  Get your own set of 4 Pint Glasses by choosing the right beer tier.



Get yourself a one-of-a-kind
Blazing Silks bobble head horse for your vehicle or wobbly item to project your
interest in the noble sport of horse racing. Yes, it can be one of your horses
and will have your horses name inscribed on the base.  Please note however
your bobble head horse is a gelding so it is a waste of time to try to breed
them with other bobble headed horses to produce bobble head fillies and colts. (N.B.
Bobble head horse food must be purchased separately.)

Our graphic designers and artists can sometimes be persuaded to sign their work and this is an exclusive chance to get a unique signed piece of artwork to decorate your own horse racing shrine with. Grab one of these now as they are limited editions, and only available because we promised our artists pizza and shelter for making them.

This gets you a back stage pass to our closed Beta of the new game, be one of the first to learn the ropes and get a head start on everyone prior to the game being released. We cannot transfer your earnings in the Beta game to the live game, but you will have something much more valuable - experience and knowledge, our new game is quite different to the original Blazing Silks and there is a lot to learn for a new player!


Ever wanted to make your
mark on gaming history, and be directly involved in what is set to be the
world's premiere online racing experience on Facebook and mobile? This perk
offers you just that by giving you the chance to be involved in the design
phase of our next three mobile games, providing exclusive behind-the-scenes
access to the screens and gameplay as they are produced, giving your input to
the team and acknowledged on the game credits. 
You will get to personally interact with and thought partner with
Jonathan, Marcus and our design team.

This perk gets you a brand new exclusive set of Blazing Silks racing silks sent to you, but of course we cannot guarantee that they will fit you!  They will be your “stables” silks and have your farm name on them!

Digital immortality awaits you as our skilled artists will convert your approved* provided photograph into an in-game cartoon star!  Your digital self will help thousands of players play the game and you can choose whether you want to be a hired Jockey, Trainer, or farm Staff in our games

We have the best seats at the best race of the year…literally! We will also provide a private tour of backside where you can meet the trainers and jockeys competing in the event.  We will also provide dining, drink and wagering vouchers to make sure that you are in tip-top shape for all the festivities.  While the tickets won’t be available to us until January, just like this year, we will be able to get some of the best seats in the house.  So you will get to rub elbows with Hollywood’s finest and maybe event the former governor of Cal-e-forn-e-a!

story:
Make Me A Game Developer

Hi, I’m Brandon.  I am a young guy with a boat load of attitude and a megaton of courage.  I am a former English major and left college because I refuse to spend another moment of my life and dollar of my money on a career that doesn’t fit.  Ever since I was a boy, I have had the long-standing dream of making a video game and for the longest time I lacked the belief in myself that I could overcome the math and computer science challenges that lie before someone traveling this path.  Recently, I had an “ah-ha” moment and the light bulb went off - Life is too short to waste a moment of your life doing something other than what you were put on this earth to do. This campaign will fund my way into doing what I was put on this earth to do: make video games.

What I Need

In order to turn this dream into a reality, I will need:

  • $6,000 for tuition (compared to 10’s of thousands for tuition at a traditional university)

  • $1,000 for a laptop that meets the prerequisites specified in the class

I have played and loved games since childhood.  Now it’s time to transition from someone who enjoys games to someone who makes them - and I will bring all of that experience and passion to bear on my class projects.  

If I make my funding goal, the money will go directly to my laptop and tuition - anything beyond that will cover gas and travel expenses to and from the school since it is an hour away.  

What You Get

Depending how much you donate I pledge to send you a copy of the game my brother and I are working on and my three class projects.

You get the satisfaction of knowing that you gave a young person, who has the shine in his eyes to do great things, a chance to succeed.

The Outcome

The project that my brother and I are working on will benefit a lot of people - we will infuse powerful storytelling with a learning mechanic that will actually give players a skill they can bring to bear in the real world and enrich their lives.

Risks & Challenges

This 11 week course will not be easy.  I hear things like “drinking from the fire hose” when it comes to how students feel in their first few weeks in the course.  This “trial by fire” method is fantastic, and this microcollege is the first of its kind in the country.  In short, this is a fantastic opportunity and I am poised to take full advantage of it.  I had to take an aptitude test and passed - the only thing standing between me and the skills I need to make games is the funding.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute any funds, I would appreciate you sharing my information (and this page) with friends whom you think can.  Any help at all, monetary or otherwise, is greatly appreciated.

story:
Short Summary

  • This is Benjamin Pope, the lead of the studio behind the game Mirrored, Live in the Game, LLC. The game has been in production for over a year and has gone through a few changes in its evolution to where it is currently. The team has built into a solid development group of students at the University of Advancing Technology and others who have a passion for games.
  • The game studio has the mission of producing quality games and moving towards publishing and producing unique gaming experiences for players.
  • Contributors will help the game get to the next step.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

This campaign is intended to raise funds to support marketing and raise awareness for the title and studio.

Donation Incentives for Indiegogo Funders:

  • $1 - Name in contributors list on credits

  • $5 - Mini 8 1/2 x 11 Poster and all previous reward tiers

  • $10 - Full size Poster and all previous reward tiers

  • $20 - Mirrored T-Shirt and all previous reward tiers

  • $50 - Signed Poster and all previous reward tiers

  • $100 - Choice of Mirrored T-Shirt signed by devs and all previous reward tiers

  • $250 - Name integrated in game in small capacity and all previous reward tiers

  • $500 - Name integrated in game through personalized asset and all previous reward tiers

  • $1000 - Basic NPC included in the game and all previous reward tiers

  • $2000 - Personalized NPC with custom quest driven mission in game designed collaboratively among contributor and design team based around the NPC with voice - over option and all previous tiers

  • If the goal is not reached within the campaign period, then the development cycle will be delayed until the next iteration campaign starts to acquire remaining funds. 

The Impact

  • The game provides a unique adventure that is narrative and art-driven played from the perspective of an endearing protagonist, with a mix of custom art styles in the gameplay.
  • This campaign will support the studio's endeavors to make game projects here and in the future.

Risks & Challenges

  • Potential Challenges: Meeting the campaign goal, meeting milestones required in the development cycle.
  • In order to meet these challenges we have taken steps to ensure that we have solid communication in place to efficiently come up with solutions to address problems that arise. We also have redundant systems and version control to ensure backups in case of errors.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Support can come in the form of financial contributions, but we could also use your help in spreading the word of the game on social media. Feedback is welcome for any facet of the campaign-this includes the game, marketing, and funding ventures. We want to connect with our fans along the development toward the final product.
  • Follow the game and studio on Twitter and Facebook!

story:
Shadows of Imeria


Intro

Let's get this intro out of the way shall we? 
I'm a 21 year old writer with no job but a wide imagination, so far I have written purely for my own hobby and have finally decided to turn a story into a video game.

This video game will be using a 2D engine to create a game that yes "looks like a pokemon game" but with intense battles, an epic story and plenty of fun things to do.

This funding will go towards a video game created by me and a few other artists, but this funding won't be able to get you anything of worth, it's simply a means to get started. If successfully funded I will have enough to hire someone for enough music for a trailer, enough art for a bit of character design and the start of a true video game.

If I haven't scared you away yet, then let's get this project on the road to success.


What this is really is

Shadows of Imeria is a 2D, turn based adventure game with many never before seen plot twists, puzzles, characters, dungeons, monsters and a badass villain with no redeemable qualities.

Sure it may sound like plenty of games with the same kind of pitch, but this will immerse you completely into a new world, one of evil, one of wonder and one of adventure!

Story

Shadows of Imeria is set in a mystical world full of magic and wonder, terrifying creatures, bad guys and puzzles that may take a few minutes hurting your head.

You take on the role of a military general who fled the capital after witnessing it's evil, but along the way you are ambushed by hired assassins and during the attack you suffer fatal injuries which leads to amnesia.

On a journey to retrieve your memories you come across many people along the way, both enemy and ally. Your decisions can shape the world around you, so choose wisely.


What the money goes toward

If successful, the funds received from this campaign will bring some characters

to life with waist up portraits, background music will go into a few of the first maps, along with some extra music for unique events.


Some enemies will be designed, the UI will have a lot of work done to it like the menu screen, equip, inventory, shop and other parts worked in.

In short it should almost give me enough to make a lengthy trailer to show off everything.


Is it worth it?

This is the question you are asking yourself at the moment, there's no video, there isn't a shred of proof that this money will go towards what I say it will, but it is worth it.

With this money (and if extra is raised), I will be able to start my journey to create an adventure that can be experienced by you! You will get updates on the development progress, characters as they are added and you will be invited to back the future project that will completely decide this games well.. Future.

Without you..

This campaign, this project, won't be able to go anywhere without you, the people helping my dreams reach into our reality.

If you're a nostalgic gamer and love those turn based RPG's or just want a nice flowing old school game that's brimming with excitement, then funding this won't be a waste.

What will stop this?

This project doesn't come without risks and challenges.

If prices are raised by people I am hiring due to financial issues, if I suffer financial issues or if the world descends into chaos, then this project will either be postponed or cancelled.

To bypass these (All except for the whole chaos thing), I will hire respectable and trustworthy people who have a good track record, and my own money will be budgeted even tighter than usual so that I have all the extra money I need to survive.

Support us! 

Don't think this project is worth your money?
Don't have enough money to spare?

Then maybe you know someone who would be interested, social media is our friend and if you want to help in other ways, then share, support and tell everyone about this project.

story:
Using dice, marbles, and disks players maneuver through Universe to collect the most points. 

The board is set up with 4 docks and spaces designated with positive and negative points. 


Each player receives 3 ships (pieces) Dice, Marble, Disk.

Dock your ships on any of the corners you like, you can separate them if desired. 

Playing

Set the round maximum to whatever you like, 10 seems fast and fun.

Each Player sends their ship out by flicking the disk and rolling the dice and marble one at a time alternating turns with the opponents. You can knock pieces on and off their spaces. When rolling the dice, multiply the points and the dice number. 

 After each player sends their ship, calculate the scores of the landed pieces and add them for your round. 

Bonusspaces

If a player at the end of the round has a piece on a bonus space with a symbol than that player gets a round to themselves using all ships with a 20 sided dice and no negative points. 

The person with the most points at the end of the rounds set wins. Theoretically this game can be won by losing, if everyone lands on negative spaces than the person with the highest negative wins. 

Universe

The player with the most points at the end of the desired set rounds wins. Theoretically this game can be won by losing. If every space hits in the negative then the player with the lowest negative would win. I have more versions that could be made including  a universe factoid placement and a night mode. My goal is more than to make the game. I love virtual gaming but this keeps physical connection and a  tangibility aspect in play.  i wanted to make a game involving all ages and requires skill and a little luck to win. Helping would increase this games potential.
